2b1(mdo sde): bcol ldan 'das rgyal la 'bal/ 'ong bzhi lung ga la rang ka
2b2(mdo sde): granas pa re/ 'di l-I sA/ bsam pa ta rnams kyi gnas/ gnas
2b3(mdo sde): med pa dmas kye geras steng pa nyid lag rnas pa rna mas
2b4(mdo sde): pa meng pa la gnas pa dralas kyi gnas ra/ 'di lta ste/ dge
3a1(mdo sde): thams cad dkying sgra'i sbyangs pa/ dran du la gnas pa'i/ nang du yang dag 'dzeg pa
3a2(mdo sde): mngon par brjod pa bstag ge/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sha rid ti'i bu/ nang du
3a3(mdo sde): yang dag 'jog la langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la baM der seng sde pin
3a4(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bis phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
3b1(mdo sde): 'dug go/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa
3b2(mdo sde): gsus po che dang // tshe dang ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa bskul byed chen po dang / tshe dang ldan
3b3(mdo sde): pa rab 'bor dang / tshe/ dang ldan pa don yod rgyal po dang / tshedang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / che
3b4(mdo sde): dang ldan po dga' bo dang // tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba dang / che dang ldan pa dga' bad dang / 
3b5(mdo sde): rang ldan pa ci 'jigs dang // tshe dang ldan pa nye spos dang / tshe dang ldan pa mis byin gyi bu dang / tshe dang
3b6(mdo sde): ldan pa thang la gnas dang / tshe dang ldan pa me kaM la dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor dang / de dag nga
4a1(mdo sde): / gzhan yang dbang dang ldan par gyur pa lnga brgya tham pa phye 'phred kyi dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag 'dzegs
4a2(mdo sde): las langs nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der ring ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo zes pag
4a3(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ pogs gci ga tu 'khod do// yang do'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa grags sprin dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor
4a4(mdo sde): steng dang // tshe dang lnga na pa lhas mchod dang // tshe dang ldan pa grags pa 'dod dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga'
4a5(mdo sde): sde dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' 'dod dang / de dag dang gnan yang dge slong lnga brgya tham pa lam du zhugs pa las/ dab
4a6(mdo sde): mnyan yod na gnas nas/ rgyal po'i khab 'ang mi'i tshul ba ka lan dka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
4a7(mdo sde): gal bder ring ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dngos la dge pas phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dzin
4b1(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma ngam pa/ de dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' stong dang lhan gcig tu yung tsam par dbyar gnas
4b2(mdo sde): nas lam du zhugs te/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dag gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lpags nas
4b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod // yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / 
4b4(mdo sde): dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dang na bzang po dang / phug sbas dang / mis byin dang / dbang pos byin dang / chu lha dang / tshangs lha dang / 
4b5(mdo sde): stobs bzangs dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / mthong ba don yod dang / legs par yang
4b6(mdo sde): ngag zhugs dang / rab kyis rtsal gyis rnam par gnon dang / rtag tu brtson dang / brtson pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / 'gro ba 'dzin dang / 
4b7(mdo sde): 'dzin dang / bdud rtsi 'dzin dang / blo gros rab gnas dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang
4b8(mdo sde): mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang / rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / doran yod pa'i gom pas rnam par gnon dang / mi g.ye
5a1(mdo sde): gom pas rnam par gnod dang / spongs pa chen po dang / spobs pa rnon po dang / spobs pa zab pa dang / spobs pa
5a2(mdo sde): mtha' yas dang / slebs pa dpag med dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / pad+ma dpal gyi snying po dang / chos 'phags dang / lag
5a3(mdo sde): na rin chen dang / rin cher 'dzin dang / bskal pa 'gyur ba mtha' yas par go cha gas pa dang / bud med 'gyur ba'i ge cha bgos pa dang / skyes
5a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang / sems can 'gyur ba'i go cha bgos pa dang / mtha' yas khyu mchog dang / dpag med khyu mchog
5a5(mdo sde): dang dmigs pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i khyu mchog dang / bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
5a6(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyang tham dad par spyod pa'i go cha bgos pa sha stag ste/ yul tha dad pa rnams su dbyar gnas par gnas nas/ yul rgyu
5a7(mdo sde): zhing gcig tu 'dus te/ rgyal po'i khang 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan dka gnas pa ga la dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la bde
5a8(mdo sde): lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das
5b1(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'dus par thugasu chud nas/ rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon pa
5b2(mdo sde): pas/ rgyal po'i khab grong khyer chen po 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ga gnas pa na/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge snyen dang / dge
5b3(mdo sde): ma ji srid gnas pa de dag thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ 'od ma'i tshal
5b4(mdo sde): lan dag gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong sde lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
5b5(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur pa/ de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'a du bya ba mngon par 'ang mdzad// de'i tshe tshe dang
5b6(mdo sde): ldan pa 'od srung chen po lus 'phags ri la dbang po'i brag phug na/ dge slong lnga brgya tham pa thams cad kyang dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khrod
5b7(mdo sde): pa/ chos gos gsum pa/ cog pu pa/ rnga'i gding ba pa/ 'dod pa chung ga chog shes pa/ rab tu dben pa/ chos gos ngan pa 'chang ba sha dang / thabs gcig tu
5b8(mdo sde): 'dugo/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'ang mdzad pas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dge slong lnga brgya tham
6a1(mdo sde): pa de dag kyang lhan cig tu lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug nas mi sdang bar gyur te/ rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka gnas pa na 'dag
6a2(mdo sde): pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rgyang ring po nyid nas 'ongs pa gzigs te/ gzi
6a3(mdo sde): nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nas brtan 'od srung chen po 'ong ba dgon pa pa/ bsod snyoms pa/ phyag dar khros pa/ chos
6a4(mdo sde): gsum pa/ chos gos ngan pa 'chang ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la gnas pa/ 'dod pa chung gachog shes pa rab tu dben par gnas pa/ ma 'dres pa/ chos thams cad
6a5(mdo sde): dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa ste/ dge slong dag pa'i nyan thos ji snyed pa ni/ dge slong dag da ltar dge slong 'od srung chen po 'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan dag dang mtshungs pa 'dras
6a6(mdo sde): ngas yang dag par rjesu ma mthong // dge slong dag dge slong 'od srung chos gos gsum pa ni/ lha rnams dang yang smra ba dang / kun tu spro bar mi 'dod na/ mi rnams dang lta smos
6a7(mdo sde): kyang ci dgos// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po rgyang ring po nyid nas 'ong ba gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung tshur sheg/ 'od srung khyed la
6a8(mdo sde): par 'ongs// kye ma gnas brtan 'od srung gis ni 'di lta ste/ 'dir 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir yun ring po nas rnam grangs byas// 'od srung khyod gdan 'di'i byed la 'dug shig ces/ 
6b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srung la gdan gyi byed gnang ma thag tu de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na de las bskyod pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
6b2(mdo sde): khams 'di 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul// g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg cing / 'jig rten
6b3(mdo sde): du snang ba chen po yang byung bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/ 'di lta ste dper na/ yul ma ga d+ha'i khar ba'i snod la lcags kyi thu lu
6b4(mdo sde): gyis bsnun na/ 'ur 'ur zer ba de bzhin du/ btsun pa 'od srang chen po la/ gdan gyi phyed gnang ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
6b5(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan las bskyed nas/ de na saM de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'ji garten gyi khams 'di sgra skad chen po 'byin to// 
6b6(mdo sde): de na tshe dang ldan pa 'od srang chen po chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
6b7(mdo sde): mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad tu phyin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos btugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bca
6b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lags la/ bdag ni nyan thos lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
7a1(mdo sde): kyi ngos gos sapa/ lhung bzed nga ba/ gdan ram/ de las gzhan pa'i longs spyod rnams nyan thos rnams kyis longs spyad par rdzong
7a2(mdo sde): lags so// de ci'i slad pu na na/ bcor ldan 'das de dag ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa lags shing / bcom ldan
7a3(mdo sde): 'das bcor ldan 'das las sha ra'i ras ngag dar khrod gang dag blangs pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das mchod rten du gyur pa lags pa'i slad du ste/ de dag bdag gis
7a4(mdo sde): pa spyad lags so// bcom ldan 'das de slad chad 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par brtags pa 'am/ gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam
7a5(mdo sde): par 'tsha nga'i rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtags pa'am/ 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdus pas gdung sa par gyur pa'am/ zhe sdang gi yongasu gdung ba dang / gti
7a6(mdo sde): mug gis yongasu gdung bas gdungs par gyur par ma dran lag so// bcom ldan 'das mngor na slob par gyur pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las sha na'i ras ngag dar khrid pa ros pa
7a7(mdo sde): rnams/ mi slob po'i sa la thug ga bar du spyi bos mnos lag so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis longs spyad pa'i slad blangs pa ni ma lags kyi gdams pa dang / rdzasu bstan pa las
7a8(mdo sde): brtsams ras blangs lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de dag blangs nas/ sems mtho ba 'am/ dma' bar gyur par mi dran lagaso// bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag chos
7b1(mdo sde): gos pa mchis pa'i lus la spyad par mi dran lag so// bcom ldan 'das ngag dar khrod de dag sug pa ma ser bas rag par mi dran lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang du mcho ba de
7b2(mdo sde): dang der sha ra'i ras phyag dar khrid de dgar gos 'tshal cing mchis lags// bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod de dag yan lag pa gtsang ba gang gis kyang reg par pi dran
7b3(mdo sde): lags so/  bcom ldan 'das sha na'i ras phyag dar khrod mchod rten du gyur pa de dag bcangs lag so// bac+doMs de dag ni bcocoM lda yas kyis spangs shing gnang ba lags te/ de dag ni bdag gis
7b4(mdo sde): bcangs la gso// sangs rgyas rje su dran pa lags par de las gzhan snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis bdag gzhan du gnas par mi dran lagaso// bdag ji ltar gnas par sa
7b5(mdo sde): sa'i 'du shesu ma gyur pa dang / tshul chu 'du shes dang / me la ma'i 'du shes dang / rlung la rlung gi 'du shesu ma gyur pa dang / 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes dang / 'jig
7b6(mdo sde): rten pa rol gyi 'jug su pa gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / bye drag phyed pa dang / rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyis rje su brtags pa dang / rjes su
7b7(mdo sde): bsams pa de la yang / bdag 'du shesu ma gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa dang / 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes
7b8(mdo sde): las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes med pa las yang dag par 'da' ba'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes kyi gnas pa dang / gang 'du shes med pa'i gnas pa dang / gang 'du
8a1(mdo sde): shes thams cad las yang dag pa 'da' ba'i gnas pa de yang sleb pa'i gnas pa dang / mi sleb pa'i gnas par bdag gis yang dag par rjesu par thang lags/ kha
8a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das gnas pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rje su ma mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa yang dag par rje su ma thong lags
8a3(mdo sde): bdag ring ltar gnas lagaso/ bcom ldan 'das dpar bgyin// rnam pa blag par mchis pal ring dang 'arda' dang gdags pa rnam pa sna tshogs bgyis pa dag / bcom ldan 'das dang pa
8a4(mdo sde): brda' dang gdags pa gang dag gis na mkha' zhes tha snyad brtags pa dang / namanga' zhes brdad btags pa dang / na mkha' zhes brten du bgyis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dmakha' zhe 'am/ bla
8a5(mdo sde): gab ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ stong pa zhe 'am/ gsog ce'am/ gso bce 'am/ ya ma brla zhe 'am/ gzung ba ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ chad ma mchis pa zhi'ang/ rten pa mchis pa de 'am
8a6(mdo sde): drang ba ma mchis pa zhi 'am/ dor ba ma mchis pa zhe'am/ lus ma mchis pa zhe 'am/ ji lta ba bzhin zhe 'am/ yong su dag pa zhe 'am/ khar snang zhe 'am/ thogs par mchis pazhi 'am/ dngos po ma
8a7(mdo sde): mchis pa zhe 'am/ bstan du ma mchis pa zhes de dag dang / gzhan yang tha snyad kyi 'arda' tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brjod pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste tshad 'di tsam 'am/ longasu bcad pa
8a8(mdo sde): 'di tsam 'am/ mnyam pa'am/ mi mnyam pa zhes ming ngam/ brda' 'am/ rten rnams kyis 'tshal bar mi nus lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gang dag de'i phyogs tsam zhig 'tshal ba de dag thams
8b1(mdo sde): cad kyis kyang / kha dog gam/ dbyings sam darigs pas dang kha' de cad 'di tsam dang / mchog 'di tsam zhes bgyi ba ma 'tshal lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang de bzhin gshegs pa
8b2(mdo sde): sa bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba'am/ ston pa zhe 'am/ skyabs she'ang/ dpung gnyen zhe 'am/ gnas she 'am/ 'dren pa zhe 'am/ rnam par 'dren pa zhe 'am/ yongasu 'dren pa zhe 'am/ sman
8b3(mdo sde): pa zhe 'ang/ gso ba ba zhe 'am/ lam ston pa zhe 'am/ lam brjod pa zhe 'am/ gzhan yang tha snyad tha dad pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs brjod pa'i tha snyad kyi tshig gang dag gis mkhas pa rnams
8b4(mdo sde): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das bstod pa dang / bkur ba dang / dasngags ba tu bsngags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das tha snyad kyi tshe ga gang dag gis 'jig rten mngon par 'arjod
8b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ma 'tshal mi rten ma mthong lagaso// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad nang po nyid kyis la ma brla dang / ngo bo nyid kyis
8b6(mdo sde): gso lags pa'i sladra'o// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun
8b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba zhig sprun par gyur la/ bcom ldan 'das de'i thad gleng bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham su gtogs pa'i sems can rnam par rgyal bar bgyi ba la gnas pa
8b8(mdo sde): mtha' yas pa de dag tha sa cang lhags shing / bcom ldan 'das de la lus zad da par yang ga la/ bcom ldan 'das de la sems can lus tha dad par yang mthong lags song ci/ 
9a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sgyur ma ngan gyis sprul pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'di snyam du bdag gis ni dadung gi tshogs 'di'i bdag do bya zhing / gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rted kyi
9a2(mdo sde): khams kyis rje su 'jug par bya'o// skad du mi sems lags la/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag ban po de yang 'di snyam du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'ang / bdag cag gi gtso bo yi
9a3(mdo sde): bdag cag ni de'i rdzasu 'jug par bya'o snyam du mi sems lags mod kyis/ de dag de'i rjesu 'jug par bgyid par yang gda' lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos de dag gi chos nyid
9a4(mdo sde): gang lags pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ nyan thos sam/ slob pa 'am/ mi slob pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ so so'i skye bo ma mchis lag so// bcom
9a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das chos nyid de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid darigs pa'am/ de bzhir gshegs pa'i chos nyid mngon pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid brtan
9a6(mdo sde): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid mngon pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos nying rten pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ nyan thos
9a7(mdo sde): kyi chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid rten pa 'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid mngon pa'am/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid rte pa'am/ gzug
9a8(mdo sde): kyi chos nyid dmigs pa 'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ gzugs kyi chos nyid rten pa 'am/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid
9b1(mdo sde): dmigs pa'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid mngon pa 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid rten par mi 'gyur lagaso// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid da la gzugs stong pa dang / 'dis gzugs
9b2(mdo sde): stong pa dang / 'di la gzugs stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / 'dis rnam par shes pa spong pa dang / 'di la
9b3(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa stong pa dmigs pa dang / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dang / 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dang / 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa dmigs pa dang
9b4(mdo sde): de bzhin du de bzhin legs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dang / 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dang / de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid stong pa dmigs par mi
9b5(mdo sde): 'gyur lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ de la nyan thos ma mchis/ nyan thos kyi chos nyid ma mchis/ so'i skye bo ma mchis/ so so'i skye bo'i chos nyid kyi bar du ma
9b6(mdo sde): mchis lagaso// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi ni/ sgyum mkhan gyis 'khor los sgyur ba 'am/ dpung gi tshogs sprul pa de la 'khor los sgyur ba ma mchis/ dpung gi tshogs ma mchis
9b7(mdo sde): lagaso// sgyu ma la ma mchis/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid la ma mchis/ sgyu ma mkhan rnams la ma mchis lag so// sa la ma mchis/ tshul ma mchis/ me la ma mchis/ rlung la ma mchis/ namakha'
9b8(mdo sde): lam mchis/ rnam par shes pa la ma mchis lag so// sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / na mkha'i khams la ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la ma mchis lagaso// bcom ldan
10a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni de dang 'dra lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag ni rlom sems mi bgyid / de dag la bdag ni byung bar ma gyur/ de dag bdag gis ni pa smras lags
10a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag ni yon tan gyi chos rnams nyid las dben pa lags pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos rnams rjesu dran par bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das de ni lam lags
10a3(mdo sde): de ni tshul lags te/ lam de la gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo lam nga rjes su thob pa rnams ni 'di snyam gzhan yang dag par blangs la 'jug par bya zhing / ston pa yang gzhan bas
10a4(mdo sde): bar bya la/ dge sbyong ngam bram ze gzhan smra ba'i gdong du gyen du blta bar bzhi pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni shes bzhin pas shes/ mthong bzhin pas mthong / yang dag pa'i lta ba yang 'degs
10a5(mdo sde): bzhin pas 'dogs par byeng // snyam du mi sems lags te/ de ni gnas ma mchis lag so// bcom ldan 'das gnas pa 'di la ni bdag som nyi ma mchis pas thob pa
10a6(mdo sde): gnas lagaso// chos kyi sgo de yang rjesu thob pas gnas lags// chos thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ dben pa'i tshul dang / skye ba ma mchis pa'i tshul dag gis tshul gcig pa la gso
10a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ chos kyi the tsom zhu bar 'tshal ba lags la/ de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag
10a8(mdo sde): la skabs pa ba lags te/ dbang po'i brag du gnas 'od ma'i tshal 'dir phyin pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'dir mchis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan gyi byad gnang ste/ 
10b1(mdo sde): bdag la gnang ba na/ steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu 'ur 'ur zhing rnab pa drug tu yang rab tu g.yos lagaso// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snyam du/ de bzhin
10b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa ni bdag nyid chen po'i chos dang ldan pa de lta bu dang / rgya chen po'i chos dang ldan pa de lta bu dang / slob dpon pa mchis shing rang byung ba lags kyang / thugs rje chen po'i tshul
10b3(mdo sde): la bzhugs shing / lhag pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis pa dang / nga rgyal ma mchis pa la bzhugs nas/ bdag la gdan gyi deng gnang ba ngo mtshar la gso snya bgyid de/ bcom ldan
10b4(mdo sde): 'das dper bgyi da pi dbul po 'tsho ba ngan pa tshegs kyis 'tsho ba zhig tshegs kyis khyim gyi phun sum tshogs pa bsgrubs na sa/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bos nas dbang
10b5(mdo sde): bskur ba dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i gan du blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / dri bar 'gyi ba'i sla du mchis par gyur la mchis pa de la ngas snga
10b6(mdo sde): gyi ping stsal na/ de nas de 'di snyam du sems lags te/ rgyal po la blta ba dang / ngag bya ba'i pir bdag song du zin kyang bdag gis blta ba 'am/ phag pa pa yang dka' bar 'gyur na/ gsol
10b7(mdo sde): nga lta ci smos/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi ba nas dbang bskur bas/ bdag phyin ma thag pa la stan gyi byed byin du zin kyang 'di ni ngo mtsha ro snyam bgyid lags// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinadu chos kyi
10b8(mdo sde): rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rang byung ba slongab dpon ma mchis pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bsnyen par dka' zhing
11a1(mdo sde): rtogs par dka' ba lags pa/ lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis lha smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
11a2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la/ chos kyi the tsom zhu ba dang / blta ba dang / ngag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i sladu/ bdag ji lta ji ltar mchis pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ji
11a3(mdo sde): snyam du sems lags te/ bdag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba rnyed cing / phag bgyi ba rnyed la/ bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / zhu ba dang / yongasu zhu bar bgyi ba rnyed de/ bcom ldan 'das
11a4(mdo sde): kyis da ltar bdag 'dir lha mchis pa la gdan gyi pang gnang ba ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar mi dbul po ngas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i
11a5(mdo sde): rgyal po de la blta ba nyid dang / pag bgyi ba nyid yang ngo mtshar lags pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di snya ma du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni byams pa
11a6(mdo sde): chen po dang ldan zhing / thugs pa ngas 'tshan po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang ldan pa lags kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gang dag lags pa de dag ston pa ma gtogs par/ de bzhin
11a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'di snyam du/ bdag ni phul dang bdag ni mchog dang / bdag ni khyad par du 'phags pa'o snyam du mi dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar lags te/ bdag ni 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa
11a8(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lagaso snyam bgyid lagaso// de skad
11b1(mdo sde): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka' stsal pa/ 'od srung legaso leg so// 'od srung khyod yang leg so// 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpag tu
11b2(mdo sde): med cing dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan te/ de ni sbyin pa'i chad de lta bu dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / shes rab kyi bar gyi tshad de lta bu dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad
11b3(mdo sde): lta bu dang / smon lam rnams kyi chang dang lta bu dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshang de lta bu dang / thabs kyi tshad de lta bu dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chang nga lta bu dang / 
11b4(mdo sde): spyod pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par grol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshang de lta bu dang / rnam par
11b5(mdo sde): grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i tshad de lta bu dang / rnam par gro la ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad de lta bus dpag par mi nus// 'od srung bzhi po 'di dag ni/ 
11b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i mi mnyam pa'i ye shes rnams yin te/ de dag dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang dusad+d+hi sgra sgrogs par byed pa'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims panyam pa
11b7(mdo sde): rang / ting 'dzin mnyam pa nyid dang / shes rab ma'am pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de/ 'od srung mnyam pa'i ye shes bzhi po dngag ni gang dag dang ldand/ nga 'dir gshegs
11b8(mdo sde): ba 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs shing / seng+ge sgra yang dag par sgrogs par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ngo tshe tshig su bcang ba 'di dag bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas 'jig rjer ngas pa yas
12a1(mdo sde): / ma sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yas te// sems kyi las 'i sbya sapas na// de ga pa d+hA'i sgra sgrogs byed// sa d+hi rI A sgrogs byed pa'o// su lcags gzha rnapas skrag pa
12a2(mdo sde): 'gyur// chos kyi chos nyid thos nasu// galang sar rab tu ltung bar 'gyur// bdag tu 'du shes gang gnas dang // sems can 'du shes gang gnas pa// 'od srung de dag bstan 'di la// bu stegs
12a3(mdo sde): can zhes ngas bsha// dngos po'i 'du shes gang gnas dang // nga'i nga zhes rten pa dang // 'od srung de dag bstan 'di la// mu stegs can zhes ngas pa sha // gang dag tshul khrims phung po dang / 
12a4(mdo sde): bsam gtan rnams dang thos rang gis// rlom sems rnams rmongs de dag ni// 'od srung bu stegs can rnam so// bdag ri chog shes 'dod dung dang // rab tu dber la gnas pa dang // chos
12a5(mdo sde): ngadang 'chang snyam pa// 'od srung deni bu steg so// dper na rang khal di la ni// lag pa bskyod kyang thogs med cing // nga ber na dang kha' la rdul gyis kyang // nam yang gos par mi 'gyu
12a6(mdo sde): ba/ de bzhin 'od srung ngas bstan pa'i// chos 'dir gang dag gnas de dag/ nyon mongs rnams kyi mau gos te// mkha' las rdul dang spyan bzhi no// ji ltar mkha' la mi yos me tog spos rnams dang // de
12a7(mdo sde): bzhin phreng ba byug pa rnams kyis 'dir mchod kyang // bdag pa chos la la skye 'gyur 'jig par 'gyu ro zhes// de la blo gros kyang ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur dang // ji ltar na mkha' de la gos par mi 'gyur dang
12a8(mdo sde): ji ltar rang bzhin gos par mi 'gyur dang // ji ltar rang bzhin ngo bo nyid kyis gsob// de bzhin dge sbyong dag la stong pa'i chos rnam so// ji ltar gang gis na mkha' bsdigs pa dang // ji ltar nam du yang ni
12b1(mdo sde): gshe bar mi 'gyur ba// de bzhin dge sbyong dag la chos rnams gang dag yin// de dag na mkha' bzhin du gos pa med chos rnams// chos 'di dge sbyong gang dag legs par bslabs rnams dang // gzhan
12b2(mdo sde): dag slob pa rnams dang slob par 'gyur ba rnams// 'di la nab du 'ang ni gang dag chags par mi 'gyur ba// nga yis de dag dge sbyong legs bslabs rnang su bstan// ji ltar mkha' la rab 'ang lag
12b3(mdo sde): pa mi thogs dang // rdul dang du ba rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur dang // ji ltar la pa ni nam yang byed par mi 'gyur ba// chos la de bzhin mos pa rnams ni dag sbyong yin// ji ltar sprin dang bral bar
12b4(mdo sde): gyur pa'i namakha' la// zla ba thogs pa med pas mkha' la 'gro byed kyang // bdag gis bar snang la ni snang bar bya snyam du// de la rang rtog de ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur bzhin// rgod med
12b5(mdo sde): bdag zhing dge slong zla ba lta bu yi// sbyid pa'i bdag po'i khyib rnam su ni 'gro bar bya// rgong meng nga rgyal rnam grol sam sa dang ldan pa dang // 'jig rten chos rnams kyis ri ba gos sarba
12b6(mdo sde): ldar bya// khyib rnams la ni nga rgyal sbas nas bsten par bya// der phyin nas kyang chos nyid rab tu brjod par bya// bde dang rnyed pa'i phyir ni 'dod pa'ang spasbas rasu// 'jig rten rnab dag rdul khrims ca
12b7(mdo sde): drags padubya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// ba nga ldan pa'i srung chen po la bka' stsal pa// 'o srung 'angs shig yongs layang gi sngam pa 'dug yog/  srung khyod ma chos kyi thas
12b8(mdo sde): ji sring long pa dag de bzhir gshegs pa la dris shig dang // 'od srung ngas dris pa la la btab pas khyod kyi sabs rangs par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po sa'i steng de nas las
13a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi rangs la go ngos phyag 'tshal ras phyogs gcig tu 'dug// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu dngon par 'du bya bar dngon par 'du mdzad
13a2(mdo sde): pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na dge slong dang / dge slong ba dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen pa ji snyed gnas pa de dag thams cad/ rgyal po ri khab 'od ma'i tshal ba ka la na nga ka gnas dpal ba dang / 
13a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan ras ga la ba der bong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / lga
13a4(mdo sde): dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam khar lding dang / mi 'ab ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag yin ba de dag kyang / 'od pa'i tshal byaka lanang ka gnas par
13a5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ de gzhugs nas mtha' yas shing dngag tu mang par shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lang
13a6(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul ji lta bur ngon par du bya bar ngon par du mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 
13a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa chen po dang / 'od gsal dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/ sangs rgyas kyi dathus rgyal po'i khab 'o ma'i chal ba
13a8(mdo sde): ka land ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos ngag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'ad
13b1(mdo sde): la bral mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya bar ngon par du mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'ang rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu dngon par 'du bya ba mngon par du badzad pa
13b2(mdo sde): klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / snam bu'i dbadu phyug dang / goru ta pa dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' dang / gzi can dang / 'jog po dang / rab mdzes dang / e la'i 'ad ba dang / de dag dang
13b3(mdo sde): gzhan yang klu bye ba drag stong / sangs rgyas kyi mthus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos pag 'tshal ste/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod cing
13b4(mdo sde): rgya chen po'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge
13b5(mdo sde): bsnan dang / ngag bsnyen pa de dag thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'od ma'i tshal ba ka lan da ka gnas par zhug/ sa nas/ gcig la gcig nyam nga ba med pas 'khod par
13b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod longs la
13b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bzhugs nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam dradra yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems
13b8(mdo sde): car thams cad kyi ngas pa pasgrub pa'i spyod pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams
14a1(mdo sde): sang chos la yang da pa gzhol ba'i rdul gyi sgo rgya batsho'i phyag rgya rangag la ston par 'gyur/ byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi spyod pa bsgrub pa 'ang dag
14a2(mdo sde): par ston par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa 'ang dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems cad yongasu smid pa rabya pa bsgrub pa 'ang dag par stod par 'gyur/ sbyir ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub
14a3(mdo sde): pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur ba nas/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa'i bar du yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi sgo bsgrub pa 'ang dag par ston par
14a4(mdo sde): 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po bsgrub pa ya nga dag par ston par 'gyur/ sems can thams cad kyi ga nas pa'i spong ba bsgrub pa yang dag par ston par 'gyur/ 'khor
14a5(mdo sde): ba'i yang dag par tshim par byeng bar 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha pa yin dang / dpakha' lding dang / pi 'ang ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor kyang yang
14a6(mdo sde): dag par ting par byed par 'gyur/ 'das pa'i dus la ma chags pa thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang / de bzhin du da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ba chags pa thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba
14a7(mdo sde): dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / spyod pa dang / smon lam rnams dang / ye shes kyi phyogs tsab zhig yang dag par ston par 'gyu ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ro'u dgal gyi bu chen po stan las
14a8(mdo sde): langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gdan 'angang du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten srid cig bsham so// steng gi bar snang la yang bcom ldan 'das
14b1(mdo sde): kyi 'chags rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ ka tsa lin da'i gos ltar reg na bde ba srid kyi tshad ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang ldan pa/ rgyar ni dpag tshad bdun brgya dang ldan pa zhig byaso// 'chags
14b2(mdo sde): sa de la yang rtsig pa rim pa bdun dang / rta babs bdun dang / stegs bu rim pa bdun dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rib pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba sprul to// 'cha sa de'i g.yas g.yos su
14b3(mdo sde): yang 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / baiDUr+ya rin po che sna bzhi'i shing ljon pa dag mngon par sprul to// gser las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la dngul gyi lo ba dag dang / 
14b4(mdo sde): shel gyi me tog dang / baiDUR+Ya las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag dang / dbul las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnabs la gser gyi lo ma dag dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa'i me tog dag dang / 
14b5(mdo sde): las byas pa'i 'bras bu dge dang / dr-iDUR+Ya las byas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo pa dag dang / dngul gyi me tog dag dang / shel gyi 'bras bu dag dang / shel las
14b6(mdo sde): bas pa'i shing ljon pa rnams la gser gyi lo pa dag dang / dngul gyi me tog dag dang / bai DUR+Ya las byas pa'i 'bras bu dag dngon par sprul to// shing ljon pa thams cad kyi bar dag tu yang ya
14b7(mdo sde): lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i dus bkang ba'i rdzing theb skas bzhi dang ldan pa/ theb skas de dag kyang rin po che sna bzhi'i gser dang / dngul dang / du raR+Ya dang / shel las byas pa/ gser gyi nga
14b8(mdo sde): ma gangal ba/ ut+pa la dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar pos khabs pa/ steng gi bar snang la yang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i dra ba'i bla ras bris pa zhig mngon par sprul to// 'cha
15a1(mdo sde): / sa de yang dar gyi lda ldi mang pos sbyangs pa/ bdug spos dri zhim pos bdugs pa/ mi bdun gyi srid tsam du me tog snga tshogs kyi bcal bkras pa zhig mngon par sprul to// 
15a2(mdo sde): At+pal dang / pad+ma dang / kun pu dang / pad+ma dkar po de dag la yang po'u dgal gyi bu dang 'dra ba'i dge slong dag dngon par sprub to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa po'u dgal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phrul gyis
15a3(mdo sde): byas pa'i gdan de lta bu de mngon par sprub te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi tha phyin nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gdan bshar sa lags na/ de'i dus la dbab par
15a4(mdo sde): mkhyen par mdzadadu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa po'u dgal gyi bu cher po la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi bu khyod kyis gdan bshams
15a5(mdo sde): zin tam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bshams la gso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul mtha' yas pa la dngagra
15a6(mdo sde): pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pa la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sang+ge'i khri shoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la bzhugs nas/ sems can grangs
15a7(mdo sde): cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul mtha' yas pa la dmigs
15a8(mdo sde): pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyen nas gdan bshamaso// gdan de shoms pa na byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis/ sang+ge'i gdang
15b1(mdo sde): de rang rang gi bla gos dag bting ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di skad du dgongs te/ bdag gis ni 'di lta ste/ the tso pa dang so nyi bsal ba'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya bar ngon par
15b2(mdo sde): 'du mdzad pa gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa'adi dag gi spyad pa sgrub pa dang / 'jug pa sgrub pa dang / smon la bsgrub pa dang / zhing bkod pa bsgrub pa dang / sams can yongasu smin par bya ba
15b3(mdo sde): gang dag yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa byung ba dang / nyan thos phun sum
15b4(mdo sde): tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / bang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba dang / chos bstan pa phun sum tshogs pa 'a byung ba dang / tshe phun sum tshogs pa dang / mdog pun su
15b5(mdo sde): tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang / dpe byad phun sum chog sa pa dang / yang dag pa'i sbyor ba pur sum tshogs pa dang
15b6(mdo sde): dang pa'i chos rab tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad rang rang gi chos gos dag las mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par
15b7(mdo sde): 'du bya ba nges mngon par 'du bya'o snya po// de nas bcom ldan 'das drad pa dang mkhyen bzhin du gdan de la bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na de la bzhugs ngas kyang yul mtha' yas pa
15b8(mdo sde): la dmigs pa bsgrub pa nges par ston pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la stobs par zhug so// de bzhin gshegs pa ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ras/ de nas de ba phrag tu byang
16a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos ji snyed pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi gdar du bang // de dag gis rang rang gi chos gos de dag la bdag nyid kyi
16a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa nas/ rab tu rnam par mi 'jig pa phur su pa tshogs pa'i bar du yang bathong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag yang dag pa
16a3(mdo sde): che ba zhing yid rangs te dga' ba dang / ngang ba la gnas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la sgra skad 'thun par tshigasu bcad bstod pa/ cho ga spyod pa yon tan gnas gyur pa// chos rnams kur
16a4(mdo sde): la dbang ldan bsnyengs mi mnga'// yon tan kun la gnas pas khyod mdzes te// rgyal ba dbang ldan ting 'dzin yang dag gnas// g.yo dang sgyu ri khyod las yong mi ranga'// nga rgyal rgod pa
16a5(mdo sde): tshul 'chos pa dnga' ste// rig dang rnam grol dag gi spyod pa mkhyen// ting 'dzin de la gnas pas khyod padzeso// dab nga ldan bsnyengs bral ting 'dzin gnas nasu// rdzu 'phrul
16a6(mdo sde): mi mtshungs bla na med pa bstan// chags meng ye shes bsta na phyir dbang ldan pa// pa 'ongs dus ni khyod kyis dang bstan to// mo g.yo ga 'phang zhi ba thob snyam bgyid// de ring byang chub la
16a7(mdo sde): ni mchis snyam bgyid// bdud dpung bcas pa rab tu bcom snyam bgyid// de ring rig pa rjesu thob snyam bgyid// rgyal bas gang gis 'das pas stong gzigs pa'i// bla med rig
16a8(mdo sde): ni thob par 'gyur snyam bgyid// chags med ye shes khyod kyi bka' drin la// mig kyang chags pa mchis pa yong ma lags// rnam par mthong yang ci yang ma mthong zhing // chos
16b1(mdo sde): ni gang la'ang zhe 'gras ma mchis te// gang la yid ni zhe 'gras pa mchis pa// de ni sangs rgyas spyan mchog de lagaso// ji ltar rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas spar mchog gis// khams
16b2(mdo sde): gsum shes la ma chags 'jug pa bzhin// dngos dang dngos med mnyab batshungs yid dang ldan// yang dag brtson zhing rang gi mig la gnas// gang tshe rgyal ba ting 'dzin der gnas te// 
16b3(mdo sde): de ring de dag kun gyis thong skab bgyid// de dag gis ni gzungs sgo de dag dang // chos la rnam par grol ba'i sgo mchog thob// sgor 'jug yongasu sbyang ba rnam dag pa// rgyal ba'i blo
16b4(mdo sde): long la nyams pa 'gyur// sbyin pa chen po'i rnam sprin de 'dra ste// khrims chen yon tan de dag de 'dra lags// shes rab chen po'i yon tan nge 'dra ste// sngor cad chos
16b5(mdo sde): de dag ni bsten pa mdzad// khyed ni gdan bzhugs pas pa gtan mdzad pa na// mi yi dbang po pogs bcur lhang nge gyur// rgyal sras thugs kyi sras po 'dus de dag/ 
16b6(mdo sde): gang nas shi 'phos las ni ci mchis pa// lha dang klu dang mi min mi 'ab ci// kun la de ring shes pa de 'jug go/ kun tu snang bar gyur pa'i ting 'dzin la// gang gis bskal byer
16b7(mdo sde): shes pa de bskyed pa// so bzhi gcod cing the tsom sel ba yis// mi mchog seng+ge bzhin du sgrogs par gyur// bdag dang gzhan la par pa tshol ba // 'di ltar sngon chad spyir
16b8(mdo sde): ba bsal lags te// 'di la sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson gang // sems can kun la de 'drar bskal ba mnyam// sems can de dag thams cad la btud par// 'di la
17a1(mdo sde): sbyin dang rdul khrims bzod 'artson dang // sems can kun la kun tu mkhas pas na// 'di la ting 'dzin 'jug dang shes rab pachog/ des khyod kyis
17a2(mdo sde): rnam par spangs// dpa' ba de ring gdan la bzhugs pa la// thal mo sbyar nas khyod la zhus lags na// som nyi gcad cing the tsom bsal du gsol// dang 'dir chos la kun tu
17a3(mdo sde): snang thob cing // the tsom dral te snang ba thor gyur pas// sems can gang dag 'byung dang bdag cag la// chos kyi tshul ni yun ring gnas par 'gyur// gleng bzhi'i le'u zhes bya
17a4(mdo sde): ba ste dang po'o// yang de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba gzho du gyur pa zhig 'das par gyur te 'dug// de nas pad+ma dpal gyi
17a5(mdo sde): snying po gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mos g.yas pa'i ldangs la gcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga
17a6(mdo sde): la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'dug/ de ltar 'dug pa de'i sems la rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi sgo rnams nub
17a7(mdo sde): 'dod pa yin/ rdo rje'i tshig rnams/ rgyun mi chod pa'i bsgrub pa'i tshig rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin/ smra ba thams cad tshar gcad pa bsgrub pa pa'i tshig rnams dang / 'dad pa yi
17a8(mdo sde): smra ba thams cad tshar gcad pa bslab pa'i rim par phye ba'i tshig rnams dang / chos thams cad bsdu ba'i tshig rnams zhu bar 'dod pa yin na/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
17b1(mdo sde): po dag phyag rgya'i sgo gang dag la bslabs na/ chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mig dang shes pa la mkhas pa nying rjesu thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi la bdag gis
17b2(mdo sde): bsam pa'i tshogs gang dag dang 'jug pa bsgrub pa gang dag gis go cha bgos pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs skye ba la bsam pa bsgrub pa'i tshogs la dgongs par 'gyur
17b3(mdo sde): snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pad+ma dpal gyi snying po gzhonur gyur pa'i bsal pa thugs su chud cing smon lapa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsgrub pa thugasu tud nas/ 
17b4(mdo sde): da'i rje ngogs bzhir rnam par gzig so// phyogs bzhir gzigs pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer chen po bzhi byung ste/ de dag byung ni 'jig rten gyi khams
17b5(mdo sde): mtha' yas pu med pa dag tu dong ngo // 'od zer de da ga kyang shing ljon pa 'am/ rtsig pa'ang/ ri 'am/ sa la// bar snang gang du bab pa de dag thams cad gser gyi
17b6(mdo sde): kha dog tu 'dog gzhi ra gyur to// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad yang 'od zer de dag thogs pa med par rab tu dong ste/ de ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
17b7(mdo sde): khams na 'ong de dag gis reg pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang gi lus ngag gser gyi lus lta bur sheso// gang dag 'dod chags kyi yongasu gdung bas yong
17b8(mdo sde): su gdungs pa dang / zhe sdang gi yongasu gdungs pa dang / gti mug gi yongasu gdung bas yongasu gdungs pa de dag thams cad kyis ni bdag nyid 'dod chags chung ba dang / zhe sdang tung ba dang
18a1(mdo sde): gti mug chung bar mngon par sheso// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dpal ba ji snyed yod pa de dag tu sems can skyes
18a2(mdo sde): pa gang dag sdug bsngal tsha ba mi zad pa mchi ba'i mthar bad pa'i tshor ba nyamasu myong ba de dag thams cad kyis ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi
18a3(mdo sde): smon lar gyi mthus bde ba snyam du shes par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang / nyor mongs pa'i sgrib pas bsgre
18a4(mdo sde): pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur pa'i sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa'
18a5(mdo sde): de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis sgrib pa dang bral bar gyur to// de'i cha sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba cher gas la bar bya ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spu'i khung bu thams
18a6(mdo sde): cad nas 'od zer dag byung ste/ 'od zer de dag kyang shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dag 'daso// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og tu 'jig rten gyi khamra
18a7(mdo sde): tshad med pa dag 'daso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer de dag phyung nas/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra mdzad/ gsung gsal ba'i sgrangs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon pa
18a8(mdo sde): go bar gyur to// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs mang po dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba de// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
18b1(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i dkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag
18b2(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i dkod pa gcig pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od 'di ni nga'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
18b3(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyu ro zhes/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i
18b4(mdo sde): bkod pa gcig pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsungs gsal ba'i sgra dang / 'od kyi snang ba chen po de gda' ba de su'i
18b5(mdo sde): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pu
18b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub pogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
18b7(mdo sde): gyi khams mi mjed ces bya pa yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste
18b8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i sde gnod sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// 'khor dadu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
19a1(mdo sde): chen po pad+ma bar gyi snying po zhes bya ba 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la 'di lnga ste/ chos thams cad la yang dag par ga
19a2(mdo sde): ba'i phyag rgya'i yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo'u bar 'dod do// dra ba can gyi 'od sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgro
19a3(mdo sde): pa/ tha ma dad par spyod pa'i go cha bgos pa dag 'khor dang 'dus te 'khod do// dra ba can gyi 'od byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha de dag dang ldan pa de dag gis sangs
19a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag kyang stong so// dra ba can gyi 'od bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag mthong ba dang / thos
19a5(mdo sde): pa lang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi gces smra sa byed par smra na/ dra ba can gyi 'od gang dag gis de dag ma thong nas bkur bsti byed dam/ bla mar dang dmag gyungs
19a6(mdo sde): bye ga / dri bar byed pa lta ci smos/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis 'di skad ces gso
19a7(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan das/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de lta blta ba dang / phyag bgyid pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
19a8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha dgos pa de dag blta ba'i sladu/ 'jig rten gyi khams der mchi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams de yang blta bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa
19b1(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab pa
19b2(mdo sde): shes na/ song la sangs rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du yang spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
19b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de dag bsnyen par dka' ba'i phyi ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od la lags
19b4(mdo sde): ba lta bu'i ud pa la byin te/ dra ba can gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la khyod kyis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal 'dis mchod cig/ nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das de
19b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig ba de/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg
19b6(mdo sde): pa la gnas sam/ snyun gsol lo zhes de skad ces gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
19b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
19b8(mdo sde): dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa dag dang lhan cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ga la ba der song ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khabs mi brjed
20a1(mdo sde): der 'dug par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ba ka lan da ka'i gnas pa ga la
20a2(mdo sde): ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos pag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bang
20a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'adra ba can gyi 'od/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das bdag dra ba can gyi 'od lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa bang go dra
20a4(mdo sde): can gyi 'od lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la ma go bos phyag 'tshalo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
20a5(mdo sde): bo dra ba can gyi 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dra ba can gyi 'od khyod yun ring du 'tsho bar gyur cig/ khyod pa de ba dang nad med par gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sams
20a6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgos bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / byang
20a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba can gyi 'od kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa
20a8(mdo sde): gcig pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol to// bcom
20b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la 'di yang bskur
20b2(mdo sde): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od las lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal bzhi su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis log pa lta bu'i ut+pal bzhis
20b3(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pa la byino// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pas lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal thogs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang skyong la sogs
20b4(mdo sde): pa lnga brgya la smras pa/ rgan rabs dag lag pa lta bu'i u t+pal 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin pa'o// de nas bzang skyong la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po da
20b5(mdo sde): dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la de rdzogs nas/ com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag da ltar yang dag par zhugs pa
20b6(mdo sde): lags na/ ci bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can gang dag gis ming thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
20b7(mdo sde): byang chub tu nges par 'gyur lags sa pa/ bcom ldan 'das lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ma pham pas bdag cag la stsal lags te/ bcom ldan
20b8(mdo sde): 'das bdag cag gis ni lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal 'dir/ rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang / spyod pa'i stobs dang / bsam pa'i stobs dang / sems can thams cad yongasu ma
21a1(mdo sde): gtong ba'i stobs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol pa 'debs pa'i slad/ lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal de gtong bar bgyi'o// bcom
21a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag/ gang dag pa byung ba dag dang / 
21a3(mdo sde): 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag dang / 'byung ba 'am 'jig pa der yang bac+doMs gtor bar bgyi'o// dpon du lho phyogs dang / de bzhin du nub phyogs dang / de bzhin du byang phyogs dang / de bzhin du 'og gi
21a4(mdo sde): phyogs dang / de bzhin du steng gi phyogs dang / de bzhin du phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji skad byung ba dang / 'byung ba
21a5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu yang gtor bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang su dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams
21a6(mdo sde): cad ut+pa la'i dri snom par gyur cig/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur cig/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang mchi bar
21a7(mdo sde): gyur cig/ de dag gis lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal de gtor nas/ de nas de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas reg ste/ lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis
21a8(mdo sde): reg nas kyang de nas de ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la ut+pa la de'i nang nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed mngon par byung zhing ut+pa la re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyed mngon par
21b1(mdo sde): byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i byed po de dag gis/ gang dag chos thams cad sgyu ba lta bu'i mi shes shing bos par mi byed la/ chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa dang / chos thams
21b2(mdo sde): cad pa tshan nyid med par mi shes shing mos par mi byed/ khong du chud par mi byed pa de dag gi ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa pa yin zhing / de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyar thos dag
21b3(mdo sde): kyang pa yi no zhes de lta bu'i tshig de dag gsungs te/ gsungs nas kyang bzhud do// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang bka' stsal to// sgyu ma 'dra chos gzung du med pa ste// gzung mir
21b4(mdo sde): thabs cad chu zla 'dra ba yin// sdong pas stong pa'i rang bzhin pa 'dzin pa// chos nyid 'di ni rgyal bas de 'drar gsungs// ra chen nyid med chos rnam dag mchan cing yin// bcar
21b5(mdo sde): nyid med pa'i rang bzhin de 'dra ste// rtags pas stong shing bdag med chos rnams la// 'dzin pa med cing rtsod pa med par 'a gyur// gang dag de ltar chos nyid de 'dod pa// de dag
21b6(mdo sde): stod nga rgyal ba dbru bo che// phyogs bcur 'jig rten spyod pa thams cad la// de 'dra 'dis byin brlab so// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa de dag gis tshig su bcad pa de dag gsung
21b7(mdo sde): sa phyogs bcur bzhud do// / bam po gnyis pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das lha byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dra ba car gyi 'od
21b8(mdo sde): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag gis ci tsam du smon labadag shin tu longasu sbyangs pa dang / sems can gang dag gis de dag gi smon lam de dag
22a1(mdo sde): thos pa dang ring yang bsgrags pa de dag sdug bsngal mang pos reg pa'i sdug bsngal de dag las yongs thar par 'gyur ba dang / bla dbang ba yang dag par rdzo
22a2(mdo sde): pa'i byang chung nges par 'gyur ba ni ngo mtshar lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das deng rigs kyi bu de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'byung ba'i cha ma lag so// de ci
22a3(mdo sde): paMr zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ skyes pa 'am bud med la zhig rin thang ma mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che dri ma thams cad dang bral ba/ phan pa dang bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub
22a4(mdo sde): par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan bsgrags pa thos ras/ yongasu btsal bar sems shing / nor bu rin po che de'i ra r-in bdag kyang legs par 'dzin par bgyid la cha
22a5(mdo sde): 'angs 'am/ de las gzhan mi gtsang ba dang 'dres pa'i phyogs dag na nor bu rin po che shin tu yongasu byang ba de 'ad bu bsal ba mthong zhing lhags par yang nor bu rin po che
22a6(mdo sde): nga'i khor yug na/ smig pa mkhar gyi rigs sam/ gdol pa'i rigs sa pa/ g.yung po'i rigs sal/ de dag las gzhan yang tshegs kyis 'tsho ba dma' ba'i rigs dag mchis pa
22a7(mdo sde): gyur na/ nga dag ni nor bu rin po che de'i ming yang ma 'tshal na/ yon tan 'tshal bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ de ni gnas pa mchis lag so// de nas mi des mi gtsang bar
22a8(mdo sde): bsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de mthong nas/ nor bu rin po che de'i snod ni mdzes pa ma yino zhes de skad ces smra bar bgyid la/ de nas dpa' ba'i mi de dag 'di skad ces smra bar bgyid de/ 
22b1(mdo sde): khyod kyis gang gis bsngags pa smras pa'i nor bu rin po che dbang yin zhes/ de skad ces smras pa dang / mi des nor bu rin po che de bstan la/ de ston pa na/ mi byis pa'i rang bzhin 'dag ma
22b2(mdo sde): 'tshal bzhin du/ kye mi khyod kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan ci'i phyir smras/ khyod kyis gang spras pa'i nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan de dag ni yod pa ma yino// khyod ni brdzun du smra ba gzhan
22b3(mdo sde): du smra ba ste/ khyod kyi tshig de dag yid mi che so zhes smras la/ de'i tshe mi des nor bu rin po che de mi gtsang ba'i gnas de nas mngon par bteg cing blangs nas mchis te/ de nas nor bu rin po
22b4(mdo sde): che de phyung nas mi de mchis ma thag tu/ mi dbul ba'i rang bzhin can de dag cigs mig shin tu rab tu rnam par 'khrug par gyur nas/ de'i rjes la gnod pa mang pos yongasu bskor ba de
22b5(mdo sde): bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed nga phul pos bltab par mchis lags te/ bcom ldan
22b6(mdo sde): 'das ji ltar mi gtsang ba'i 'dam gyi snod bsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi nges ngo 'tshal pa de lta bur ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ra
22b7(mdo sde): bdag cag balnga bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub par bgyid pa'i nor bu rin po che de legs par sbyangs shing rnam par dag pa de lta bur ni/ bcom
22b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dza ltar nor bu ring po
23a1(mdo sde): de de'i 'khor yug na/ dpa' bas 'tsho ba dbul ngos dpa' ba'i pi de dag gnas pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khabs ji mjed 'dir/ de dag wa
23a2(mdo sde): gzhan pa'i sems can rnams blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar skyes pa 'am/ bung pad kyis dor bu ring po che de'i yod tan thos nas/ ror bu rin po che de yongasu btsal bar sems
23a3(mdo sde): shing / mi gtsang ba'i snod ra mchis pa'i nor bu ring po che de mthong nas kyang / nor bu ring po de'i sdong nga ni 'tshal ba pa yi do zhes smra bar bgyid pa de bzhir du/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bas
23a4(mdo sde): ngag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang dub sem sa dpa' gang dag lags pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni 'tshab ba ma yi ro nas/ sangs rgyas bcom
23a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis pa khyab pa'i go cha dges bde dag gi bsngags pa brjod lag so// bco pa ldan 'das
23a6(mdo sde): dper bgyir/ skyes pa'ang bud med kyis nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag thos nas yongasu btsal bar sems shing / mi gtsang ba'i sdod na bachis pa de yang mthong nas/ snod ngan
23a7(mdo sde): 'char ba pa yi de 'as tshig smra bar bgyid bde bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang
23a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngas ma gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos nas blta ba'i slad bdag cag 'dir mchis te/ bcom ldan
23b1(mdo sde): 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mchis nas/ bdag gi ri 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gnod pa brgya phrag du mas bltam zhing / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba dung ngu dang ldan pa dag gis bltas
23b2(mdo sde): par mthong lag so// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyid na/ 'dam du stsal ba'i nor bu rin po che de'i 'od de pi 'dor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu dag na de bzhin gshegs pa
23b3(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi 'od de mi 'dor lags te/ 'dir ni sems can rnams kyis bsam pa dang / mos pa
23b4(mdo sde): chung ba'i slad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od 'do ba gang tsam du byin gyis rlob par mdzad lagaso// bcom ldan 'das dper bgyidan/ mi de nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan dag sgrog
23b5(mdo sde): pa na mi dbul ba'i rang bzhin can de dag mngon par yid mi ches pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das sems na de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'ong shin tu rgyas pa
23b6(mdo sde): 'am/ smon lam chen po 'am/ rnam par 'phral pa chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dag la'ang yid ches par mi bgyid na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
23b7(mdo sde): ngag gi la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ mi des mi gtsang ba'i snod de nas nor bu rin po che de blangs nas mchis la/ nges mchis pa thag tu yang sems
23b8(mdo sde): can de dag tu yang gnod pa rnam pa du bas shas cher yongasu bskor ba de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
24a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mchis nas/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'dzin du stsol ba
24a2(mdo sde): rnams gcig la gcig rab tu rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur zhing / chos kyi sgra yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ chos pa lags pa nyid kyi sgra 'byung ba kho rar bas so zhes de skad
24a3(mdo sde): gsol pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can de dag ni chos ma lags pa la gnas par 'gyur zhing / chos ma lags pas 'tsho ba nyid yang dag par blangs na
24a4(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur la/ gcig la gcig 'thab mo dang // sud 'byin pa dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / smod pa la 'jug par bgyid par 'gyur te/ de dag gcig la gcig
24a5(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos las nyams nas/ sdug bsngal thob par 'a gyur zhing / de dag chos sogs pa dang dge ba sogs pa lhung len par mi 'gyur ba'i slanga'o// bcom ldan 'das
24a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mi don 'tshal ba/ don yongasu tshol bar 'tshal ba/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par bsgrub par 'tshal ba dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa
24a7(mdo sde): pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skye bar mi bgyi na/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de tsa'i sgra du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/ sems
24a8(mdo sde): can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa dang / yang sos dang / thig nag dang / tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / de dag las zhan pa sems can dmal ba chen po dag tu sems can gang
24b1(mdo sde): ngag skyes pa de dag la skad cig thang cig yud tsam yang bde ba mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa de'i
24b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gdugs gcig pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag mchis pa de dag gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/ sems can mnar med
24b3(mdo sde): par skyes pa rnams dang 'dra bar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dir skyes pa de dag la yang bde ba ci yang yang dag par rje su ma mthong lags// sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba
24b4(mdo sde): gcig pu mchog tu gyur pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag ni rang bzhin gyi bde ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems can 'dir skyes pa rnams kyis de mngo
24b5(mdo sde): par yid ches par dka' bar 'gyur bar smra lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang chos kyi the tsom bcang ba dang / chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo mnyan pa'i slad/ gang gis
24b6(mdo sde): don du bdag 'dir mchis pa de bcom ldan 'das las bdag cag thos par 'tshal lag so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba dang sdug bsngal de dag thams cad mi
24b7(mdo sde): rtag pa lags pa'i slanga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga gang la bde ba ma mchis pa dang / sdug bsngal ba ma
24b8(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / rtag pa ma mchis pa dang / mi rtag pa ma mchis pa dang / rtog pa pa mchis pa dang / rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / dngos po pa mchis pa dang / dngos po sa
25a1(mdo sde): mchis pa ma mchis pa dang / 'dus byas pa mchis pa dang / 'dus pa byas pa mchis pa dang / gangags par mchis pa dang / gdags pa pa mchis pa
25a2(mdo sde): ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten pa ma mchis pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa ma mchis pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa ma mchis pa dang / zag pa ma mchis pa ba mchis pa dang / 
25a3(mdo sde): bden pa ma mchis pa dang / brdzun pa ma mchis pa dang / byang chub pa mchis pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnabs pa mchis pa dang / stobs rnams pa bachis pa dang / snang ba
25a4(mdo sde): ma mchis pa dang / mun pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par ra ga pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par rig pa ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang / 'bras bu pa mchis pa dang
25a5(mdo sde): 'bras bu ma lags pa ma mchis pa dang / lam ma mchis pa dang / lam ma lags pa ma chis pa dang / 'jugang ma mchis pa dang / mthar thug pa pa mchis
25a6(mdo sde): pa dang / 'jig rten pa mchis pa dang / 'jig rten nas nges par 'byung ba ma mchis pa rnam pa de lta bu'i chos thos par 'tshal lag so// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bsod
25a7(mdo sde): nams kyi tshogs las yang dag par byung ba kun rtogs pa las byung ba'i bde ba de dag dang gzhan thams cad 'jig rten la bstan par bgyi ba'i sladu'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi
25a8(mdo sde): chos rnams ni bstan du mi rung lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de la stobs rnams ma mchis/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma mchis/ rdzu 'phrul ma mchis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
25b1(mdo sde): ma mchis/ kun brjod pa ma mchis/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul ma mchis/ rje su bstan pa ma mchis/ rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul ma mchis lag so// mi 'jigs
25b2(mdo sde): pa rnams ma mchis shing / stobs rnams pamasems deb ma mchis ging sdug bsngal ma mchis lags te/ de dag thams cad ni rlom sems lags shing / de dag thams cad ni g.yo ba
25b3(mdo sde): lags pa'i slada'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid rjesu thob pa dang / rje su ma thob pa'i sladu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes zhi ba'i grangs su mchi ba ma lags
25b4(mdo sde): te/ 'di ltar de dag thams cad ni g.yo ba dang rlom sems dang // g.yos pa dang / spros pa lags pa'i sla'o// de bzhin gshegs pas ni bden pa 'am/ brdzun pa 'am/ 'dus bya
25b5(mdo sde): sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa ma mchis pa 'am/ khan pa thos pa dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba ma mchis pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa
25b6(mdo sde): 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ tshul khrims sam/ 'chal pa'i tshul khrims sam/ stobs rnams sam/ stobs ma mchis pa 'am/ mi 'jigs pa 'am/ mi 'jigs
25b7(mdo sde): ba ma mchis pa 'am/ sbyin gnas sam/ sbyin gnas ma lags pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ nyan thos sam/ rang
25b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas sam/ smon lam rnams sam/ byin gyis brlabs rnams kyi rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom zhing lam yongasu mkhyen te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa ni ngag
26a1(mdo sde): tshab mi mnga' bar seng+ge lta bu dang / glang po che lta bu'i sgra sgrogs par ma lag so// de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhid da mi 'thun pa rnams la mi 'thun pa'i du shes
26a2(mdo sde): can du gnas par mdzad/ 'thun pa rnams la 'thun pa'i 'du shes can du gnas par mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa ni bzhed na dran pa dang ldan zhing mkhyer bzhin du/ de gnyis gas
26a3(mdo sde): kyang gtang snyoms par gnas par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa dag dang / rang byung gi gnas pa dag dang / 
26a4(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang yang thun mongs ma lags pa'i gnas pa dag lags na/ de dag las ga/ na pa'i sems can tha chad rnams dang thun mong ma lags pa lnga
26a5(mdo sde): smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad thun mongs ma lags she na/ de las gzhan pa'i sem sa can tha chad kyis de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag dang / 
26a6(mdo sde): snyed kyis gnas pa de dag dang / yun ji srid nas gnas pa de dag dang / sbyor ba de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag dang / bde ba de lta bu'i gnas pa de dag 'tshal bar rngo bi thog cing / bcom
26a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang bral ba'i sems can rnams kyis gnas pa de dag 'tshal bar rngo mi thog pa'i spanga'o// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni sems can gzhan dag gi spyod
26a8(mdo sde): yul ma lags shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de lta bu de dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das spyod yul pa
26b1(mdo sde): lags pa shes bgyi ba ni spyod pa ma mchis shing / rnam par spyod pa ma mchis pa ste/ de bas na spyod yul ma lags shes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de la
26b2(mdo sde): nyan thos dag ga/ rang sangs rgyas dag gi spyod pa ma mchis pa'i sladu'o// de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de mtha' yas pa'i slanga'o// bcom ldan
26b3(mdo sde): 'das ci'i slad gnas pa mtha' yas pa lags she na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis mos pa ni mtha' yas te/ gang gis kyang 'tshal bar rdzo bi thogs
26b4(mdo sde): lagaso// de ci'i sla zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas pa de ni yi ge ma mchis pa lags te/ yi ge ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags
26b5(mdo sde): la yi ge ni brjod pa kho na lags pas/ de'i slad bcom ldan 'das de ni rang byung gi gnas pa ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang dag gnas pa de la
26b6(mdo sde): rnam par blta bar mi 'gyur zhing / rab tu 'tshal bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas shi 'phos pa lag so// gang dag gnas pa de glo
26b7(mdo sde): bar dud par mi 'gyur ba de dag gis ni gnod pa chen po dang ldan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa da ni/ bcom ldan 'das don gyi
26b8(mdo sde): sgo dang chos kyi sgo de lags te/ 'khor sgo drug khri brgyad stong dang ldan pa lag so// de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i bkod pa gcig pa'i byang dub de na mkha' lta bur tshang pa
27a1(mdo sde): mchis shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sgo gcig pa'i tshad las rjesu thob pa lag so// sgo'i tshig 'di bstan cing bshad par
27a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun khri bdun stong gis ni sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgo rjesu thob te/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa de nyid// de dag
27a3(mdo sde): thams cad kyis bdag cag gis dang byang dub thob bo// bdag cag gis deng byang chub thob bo zhes bya ba'i tshig kyang smras// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu ni bla na med pa
27a4(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyi sa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
27a5(mdo sde): bstan to// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig sa ya phrag brgyad ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyeso// dge slong sum stong ni len pa med par zag pa
27a6(mdo sde): rnams las sems rnam par gro lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas kyang / de nas de ma thag tu
27a7(mdo sde): nga'i tshe 'jig rten du 'dod chen po byung bar gyur cing / sa chen po yang g.yos par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos chos gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo gal
27a8(mdo sde): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzum
27b1(mdo sde): pa mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung ba dang / 'jig rten du sa cher g.yos pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun
27b2(mdo sde): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'adra ba can gyi 'od kyis sgo'i tshig bstan cing bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun stong gis sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i sgo thob par gyur
27b3(mdo sde): cing kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od kyis sgo'i tshig bstan pa de ni/ na mkha' yongasu zin pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du sangs rgyas brgyad stong las blangs te/ drangs
27b4(mdo sde): nas kyang de'i rjes la byang chub sems dpa' dra ba can gyi 'od sgrib pa med pa'i chos kyi sgos nges par byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la mkhas par
27b5(mdo sde): gyur pa'i phyiraro// yang de'i tshe shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na/ 'ji garten gyi khams rin po che brtsegs pa gcig pa na/ 
27b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ 'khor 'bum phrag du ma
27b7(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das de'i rgyal tshab byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon ces bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug
27b8(mdo sde): nas/ des gsungs gsal ba'i sgra thos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'od de yang mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog la 'di skad
28a1(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsung gsal ba'i sgra dang 'od gda' ba de su'i lags/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
28a2(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnod de la bka' stsal pa/ don yod khyu mchog
28a3(mdo sde): rnam par gnon nub phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa brgyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de nas de
28a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la/ 'di lta ste/ sems dpa' dpe
28a5(mdo sde): med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams las brtsams nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can tha ma sa cad yang dag par tshim par byed pa sems can thams
28a6(mdo sde): cad kyi the tsom gcod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas
28a7(mdo sde): khyu mchog la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
28a8(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thung pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / sems dpa' pe med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag blta ba'i slad du/ 
28b1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khabs mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gis byang chub se
28b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na/ rigs kyi bu khyod song la sangs
28b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing der shes bzhin du gnas par yang byos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
28b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po gang dag skyes pa de dag bsnyen pa ra dka' ba'i phyi ro// nga'i tshig gis gnod pa chung ngam nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar
28b5(mdo sde): reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma 'di yang phul cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa pas dpa' chen po ngan
28b6(mdo sde): yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bskor ba yang byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri ngargyad
28b7(mdo sde): stong dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du 'ongs te/ de 'ongs nas de ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad na/ me tog gi shing ngam/ 'bras bu'i shing ji snyed yod pade
28b8(mdo sde): dag thams cad kyis/ de'i tshe de'i dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag dang / dus ma yin pa'i 'bras bu dag gtor to// me tog gi cha rang yang dab bo// spos kyi char rnam pa sna tshogs
29a1(mdo sde): dag kyang bang po// rol mo'i sgra dam pa sna tshogs dag kyang grago/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon/ rgya
29a2(mdo sde): po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lag pa gnyis gas bcom ldan 'das
29a3(mdo sde): zhabs la bzung ngo // gdong gis kyang yongasu gtugs te/ tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon/ ba
29a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
29a5(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bco ma ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon la 'di skad
29a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal to// don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon bkur bsti byas pa dang / mchod pa dang / ri mo byas par gyur cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don pa
29a7(mdo sde): khyu mchog rnam par gnon sa las langs te/ spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
29a8(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg
29b1(mdo sde): pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das kyis lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma bskur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ 
29b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon las bzhe su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon las lag pa
29b3(mdo sde): lta bu'i pad+ma de bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnor la bka' stsal pa/ don yod khyu mchog rnam par gnon/ 
29b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ 'gyur ba mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
29b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog de gnod pa chung zhing / stobs dang ldan la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bde bar reg pa la gnas lagaso/ 
29b6(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma de byi no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
29b7(mdo sde): chen po ma pham pas lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma de blangs nas tshig gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag/ bla na med pa yang
29b8(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par gyur cig/ sems can yongasu smin par gyur cig/ de ci'i slad zhe na/ bcom ldan
30a1(mdo sde): 'das sems can yongasu ma smin pa rnams la chos bstan pa dang / sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pa rnams dang / dge ba'i rtsa bachung ngu rnams dang / 
30a2(mdo sde): dman pa la mos pa rnams la chos ston pa dka' ba'i slad ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma 'di las 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed mthong bar 'tshal ba de skad
30a3(mdo sde): kyang mthong ba dang / lag pa lta bu'i pad+ma 'di nyid las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mtha' yas khyu mchog de'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i phung po zhes bgyi ba gang
30a4(mdo sde): lags pa de yang mthong ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang mthong ba dang / de nas gang nyan thos
30a5(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa phal cher rigs pa gsum dang lnga na ba dang / rig pa drug dang ldan pa de dag kyang mthong ba ra 'gyur ba'i slanga'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga
30a6(mdo sde): pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der pad+ma de dag las kyi rnam par smin pa chen pos mngon par grub pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas na dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni byang chub sems
30a7(mdo sde): dpa' dag chos thams cad la sgrib pa ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag pa
30a8(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma skyed pa de dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i slad yong su bsngo bar bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams
