86a7(mdo sde): gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das
86a8(mdo sde): nges lag pa lta bu'i ut+pal 'di yang bskur ba legs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhes su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lag pa lta bu'i ut+pa la bzhes te/ bzhes nA/ 
86b1(mdo sde): kyang bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/ bde bar gnas sam/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'byung ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
86b2(mdo sde): 'das de lta lagaso// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri bzhi stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos brtsegs ces bya ba yod/ ngan de bzhin
86b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsan dan gyi gsung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de byang
86b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yu bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
86b5(mdo sde): chen po dri ma med kyi snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nga la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
86b6(mdo sde): dri ma med kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba de dang / gsung gsal ba'i sgra grag pa de su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs
86b7(mdo sde): kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri bani stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
86b8(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams
87a1(mdo sde): cad yang dag par tshim pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de'i tha 'jig rten
87a2(mdo sde): gyi khams der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ngas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nga'i dus lang dab par shes na song shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
87a3(mdo sde): sems dpa'i dri ma med kyi lag par tsan dan gyi thum po byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la tsan dan gyi thum po 'di phul la/ nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan
87a4(mdo sde): 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dani gyi bsung gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam
87a5(mdo sde): snyun gso lo zhes kyang gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 
87a6(mdo sde): deskor ba byas nas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskums brkyong bar byed pa 'am/ brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang / thang
87a7(mdo sde): cig dang / lung tsam des/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug/ der rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
87a8(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
87b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyis gsung gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la
87b2(mdo sde): gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das ngas tsan dan gyi thum bu 'di yang bskur ba lags ni/ tsan dan gyi thum po 'di bcom ldan 'das
87b3(mdo sde): kyis bzhe su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te gzhes nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom
87b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 2gyur pa mi mnga' 'am/ bde bar reg pa la gnas sa ma/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi
87b5(mdo sde): mnga' zhing stobs dang ldan la/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste/ bde bar gnas lag so// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rte/ na gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri sum stong 'dra
87b6(mdo sde): pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri 'das ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mig btud ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsha
87b7(mdo sde): zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// byang chub
87b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phan 'dod kyis/ snang ba chen por mthong ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
88a1(mdo sde): pan 'dod bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mig btud dgal ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
88a2(mdo sde): 'das 'od de dang / gsung gsal ba'i sgra nga su'i lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi
88a3(mdo sde): zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa sum khri sum stong ngas pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 'ang dag
88a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
88a5(mdo sde): yang dag par tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
88a6(mdo sde): thub pa de la blta ba dang pog bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i sladu/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ 
88a7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de'i dus la ngo bab par shes na song shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mig btud kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod kyi lag par pad+ma chen po'i
88a8(mdo sde): rgyal po mngon par 'phags pa gcig byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la pad+ma'i rgyal po 'di phul la/ nga'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de
88b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mig btud gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa lang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa gnas sam/ snyun gsol lo zhes de skad ces kyang gso
88b2(mdo sde): cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phag 'tshal te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskums pa
88b3(mdo sde): rkyong bar byed pa'am/ lag pa brkyang ba skum par byed pa'i skad cig dang / thang tsog dang yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi
88b4(mdo sde): mjed 'dir 'dug/ nga rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal ba ka lan da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
88b5(mdo sde): mgo bos pag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ po gas gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod kyis 'di skad
88b6(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das lo de bzhin gshegs pa mig btung gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba
88b7(mdo sde): reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das des pad+ma chen po'i rgyal po 'di yang bskur ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/ 
88b8(mdo sde): bzhes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' phan 'dod la bka' stsal pa/ phan 'dzad ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol
89a1(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lag so// de'i tshe shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi ring grangs med pa sum khri nyis stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin
89a2(mdo sde): chen mtha' yas brtsegs pa zhes bya ba long / de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te
89a3(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'byung gnas ngas/ byang chub
89a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang ga par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes bla na med snang
89a5(mdo sde): ba chen po mthong ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra chen po da yang thos// de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
89a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang / gsung gsal ba'i sgra de su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing
89a7(mdo sde): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa sum khri nyid steng ngas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
89a8(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yang dag par tshim pa
89b1(mdo sde): byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
89b2(mdo sde): chen po ye shes bla mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur brgya
89b3(mdo sde): ba dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang blta ba'i slang/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed derang dag 'chi bar bgyi'o/ 
89b4(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab parasha sa na song shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ngas/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma'i lag par me tog kha dog
89b5(mdo sde): lnga pa snyim pa gang byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis pa com ldan 'das de la me tog kha dog lnga pa gang 'di phul la/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la de bzhin
89b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa lang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam/ snyun gsol lo zhes de skad
89b7(mdo sde): ces kyang gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan
89b8(mdo sde): pa zhig gis lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar byed pa 'am/ lag pa brkyang ba sgrum par byed pa'i skad cig dang / thang cig dang yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur
90a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der 'dug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'ad
90a2(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan
90a3(mdo sde): 'das la de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes
90a4(mdo sde): snyur gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan la ngas des me tog kha dog lnga pa snyim pa gang 'di bskur ba la gas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi su gsol lo// 
90a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang bka' stsal pa/ ye shes bla ma ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang
90a6(mdo sde): ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa
90a7(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba
90a8(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin chen glang po che zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
90b1(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung bstan to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen glang po ches snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos// de nas de bcom
90b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de la zhus pa/ mthung su'i lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ngas de la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub
90b3(mdo sde): phyogs kyi phyogs char sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod/ de na de
90b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
90b5(mdo sde): sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang /  lta lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbya ro// de'i
90b6(mdo sde): tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
90b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes
90b8(mdo sde): tshogs can zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// zhes bya ba nas de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma
91a1(mdo sde): bzhin du sbyar// de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri nyis stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs rgyal
91a2(mdo sde): mtshan zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhun po'i phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
91a3(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' nges 'dren ces bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// zhes bya ba nas de yang
91a4(mdo sde): 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyaro// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri nyis stong 'das pa na
91a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs ces bya ba yod/ don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs gcig pa
91a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das de byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i mdzod gcig pa zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par
91a7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyararo// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig
91a8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams grangs medapa sum khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
91b1(mdo sde): rgyas thogs pa med pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes khyu mchog ces bya ba bla ra
91b2(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta la gso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyaro// de'i tshe shar
91b3(mdo sde): phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi gsung zhes bya ba
91b4(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ de ba zhin gshegs pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' ye she sa lhur len pa zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par
91b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de la nga 'ongs te bya ba dang / de lta la gso zhes bya ba'i bar rdzam ched gyu// de'i tshe shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing
91b6(mdo sde): grangs med pa nyi khri dgu stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpung
91b7(mdo sde): mgo zlum pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' khyad par blo gros ces bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag
91b8(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba'i bar dang / de lta la gso zhes bya nga'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyaro// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig
92a1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri chig stong 'das ngan 'jig rten gyi khams rin po chen dpal zhes bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa dag
92a2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes
92a3(mdo sde): kyi dpal zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// zhes bya ba nas de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin
92a4(mdo sde): du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri tshig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rte na gyi khams bde ba'i dpal zhes bya ba yod/ da na bzhin
92a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ud pa la dmar po'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stan te/ 
92a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma 'phags dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te
92a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba dang / de lta logaso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri tshig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
92a8(mdo sde): khams rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes me tog rin po che'i 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs
92b1(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi bkod pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
92b2(mdo sde): lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de ltar lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbya ro// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med
92b3(mdo sde): pa sum khri chig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba lod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas za
92b4(mdo sde): ba 'phags pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 2cho zhing gi zhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i 'od zer ces
92b5(mdo sde): bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu btu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te ne sa bya ba dang / de lta lags zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma ba'i du
92b6(mdo sde): sbya ro// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sum khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzod pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
92b7(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba thams cad rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston tu
92b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya
93a1(mdo sde): ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa su pa khri stong 'das par
93a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhun po'i phung po zhes bya ba
93a3(mdo sde): bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' phung po shin tu bshig pa zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
93a4(mdo sde): chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhi na du sbyararo// de'i chi shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grang
93a5(mdo sde): med pa 'i khri dgu stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi kham sa mya ngan dang gnod pa thams cad las rgal ba zhes bya nga yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
93a6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' chang pa'i
93a7(mdo sde): dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du
93a8(mdo sde): snga ma bzhin du sbyar// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri dgu stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa chos
93b1(mdo sde): kyi 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes 'byung gnas shes bya ba bla na med pa
93b2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma du sbya ro// de'i tshe shar phyog su
93b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams nyi khri dgu stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bco las 'phros pa'i 'od zer zhes pa
93b4(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des kyang byang chub sems dpa' ba cu las 'phros pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa
93b5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta la gso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyararo// de'i tshe
93b6(mdo sde): shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri brgyad stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu bla ma'i 'od zer
93b7(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
93b8(mdo sde): tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags zhes bya ba 'du snga ma bzhin du sbyar// de'i tshe shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa
94a1(mdo sde): khri brgyad stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spos shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs
94a2(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' mig bzang zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/ 
94a3(mdo sde): bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyararo// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri bdun stong 'dra
94a4(mdo sde): pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi ngad ldan zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon 'pha gas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
94a5(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chubs mas dpa' snang ba mtha' las zhes bya ba/ bla na me da pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bsdu
94a6(mdo sde): to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi
94a7(mdo sde): khri bdun stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams lam snang dpal zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
94a8(mdo sde): gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
94b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri
94b2(mdo sde): drug stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po mchog gi dpal zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 
94b3(mdo sde): 'tshe 'di bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs shes pa ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ 
94b4(mdo sde): de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbya ro// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi kha mas grangs med pa nyi khri lnga stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten
94b5(mdo sde): gyi khams chos bzangs shes bya ba 'ong / den de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can gyi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom
94b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog ces bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta
94b7(mdo sde): leg so zhes bya ba'i bar du sngam bzhin du sbyaro// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams gras med pa ni khri bzhi stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba yod/ 
94b8(mdo sde): de nang bzhin gshegs pa blo mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi bsung zhes bya ba
95a1(mdo sde): blan me nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang dub tu rung bstan to zhes bya ba nas// de yang los te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags so sa bya pa'i bar du sngam
95a2(mdo sde): bzhin du sbyar ro// / dam po drug pa// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri sum stong 'das pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams shi
95a3(mdo sde): tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sem
95a4(mdo sde): dpa' rin po che'i bkod pa zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan te zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta la gso zhes bya ba'i bar du
95a5(mdo sde): snga ma bzhin du staro// de'i tsho shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri nyis stong 'das pa na/ 2jig rten gyi khams ut+pa la zhes bya ba yod/ der
95a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ ba com ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags
95a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta la gso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbya ro// de'i tshe
95a8(mdo sde): shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri tshig stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams byang chub yan lag rab gnas shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa u
95b1(mdo sde): la'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
95b2(mdo sde): chub tu bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta la gso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyararo// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa nyi khri
95b3(mdo sde): steng 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma rab gnas shes bya ba yod/ de nang bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rab gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 
95b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin chen rab rdzogs shes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig
95b5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams ye shes kyi stobs shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
95b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rin chen thub pa zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta la gso zhes bya ba
95b7(mdo sde): bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri brgyad stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogasu rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba yod/ 
95b8(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges bang chub sems dpa'arnam par bsgrags
96a1(mdo sde): pa mtha' yas shes bya ba/ bla ma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de lang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lags
96a2(mdo sde): shes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyararo// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri bdun stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod/ ngan
96a3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' sa la ri na che zhes bya
96a4(mdo sde): ba/ bla na meng pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta la gso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar/ 
96a5(mdo sde): che shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri drug stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba na sa bya ba yod/ nga na de bzhin ga shegs pa sel
96a6(mdo sde): rin po che zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' kun tu sbas shes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
96a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sba ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs
96a8(mdo sde): meng po khri lnga stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod do/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo bsgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
96b1(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' shing rta bzang po can zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de la
96b2(mdo sde): 'os te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyaro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri bzhi stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khar+tha
96b3(mdo sde): gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rta zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
96b4(mdo sde): dpa' rgyu skar gyi rta zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas de yang 'od sa te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga
96b5(mdo sde): ma bzhin du sbyaro// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi kha mas grangs med pa khri sum stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya
96b6(mdo sde): pa yod/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa brjod pa don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' don yod ming
96b7(mdo sde): rgal zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma du bzhin
96b8(mdo sde): du sbyar// de'i tshe shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa khri nyis stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan bral zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal
97a1(mdo sde): 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' dpal mtha' yas gzi brjid ces bya
97a2(mdo sde): ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyaro// de'i tshe
97a3(mdo sde): shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa khri chig stong 'das pa ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams sdom pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal
97a4(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' dpas byin zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
97a5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de langa'o ngas te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbya ro// nga'i tshe shar phyog su sangs
97a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba don yod ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa don yod rnam par gnon zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 
97a7(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' drin yod pa'i go cha bgos shes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
97a8(mdo sde): lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar// de'i tshe shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa
97b1(mdo sde): dgu stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
97b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin chen snang zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de
97b3(mdo sde): lta lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbya ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes
97b4(mdo sde): bya ba yod/ da na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa 'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ba zhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
97b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tha mi dad pa'i go cha zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bsta na to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / 
97b6(mdo sde): de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga bzhin du sbya ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi
97b7(mdo sde): 'od zer zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi 'od zer zhes bya bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bco ldan 'das
97b8(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba
98a1(mdo sde): dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar// de'i tshe shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na/ 'jig
98a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab kyi rtse mo mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 
98a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi stobs shes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes
98a4(mdo sde): bya ba dang / de lta la ga so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi
98a5(mdo sde): khams rin po che'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
98a6(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' dad dpon chen po zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ 
98a7(mdo sde): yang 'ongs te shes bya ba dang / de lta lagaso so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbya ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na// 'jig
98a8(mdo sde): rter gyi khams chos shes bya ba yod/ ngan de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
98b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' ud pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar
98b2(mdo sde): du snga ma bzhin du sbya ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod/ ngan de
98b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rin po che mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' grags sbyin
98b4(mdo sde): bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyararo// de
98b5(mdo sde): tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pab rgyang stong kho na 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i snying po zhes bya ba yod/ ngan de bzhin gshegs pa
98b6(mdo sde): spos snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' sa'i dbang phyug ga rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bla na meng pa
98b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyararo// de'i tshe shar phogs
98b8(mdo sde): su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa brgyad stong kho na 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser 'od ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs po phyogasu rnam par bsgrags
99a1(mdo sde): nga'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rnam par
99a2(mdo sde): bsgrags pa'i go cha zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lag so zhes bya ba'i
99a3(mdo sde): bar du snga ma bzhin du sbya ro// de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bdun stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shes 'phags zhes bya ba yod/ don de
99a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sbas pa'i bdag po sprin gyi dang daphyag mar me zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gan sa la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges bya
99a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bsta na to zhes bya ba nas de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / ngal
99a6(mdo sde): lag so zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyo ro// de'i tshe shar phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa drug stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu shin tu smras shes bya/ 
99a7(mdo sde): ba long/ de na nga bzhin gshegs pa snang ba mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' snang ba chen
99a8(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du
99b1(mdo sde): sbyar/ de'i tshe shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa lnga stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mar me byed ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi ye shes
99b2(mdo sde): mtha' yas 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgyal po snang zhes bya ba
99b3(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ de yang 'ongs te zhes bya ba dang / de lta lagaso zhes bya ba'i ngar du snga ma bzhin du sbyaro// de'i yang
99b4(mdo sde): mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams sgron ma byed ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa du ma rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos
99b5(mdo sde): kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
99b6(mdo sde): to// ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams do sgron ma byed ces bya bar bstan ce na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dag gis khengs pa'i rdzing
99b7(mdo sde): rgya che zhing yongs pa/ grangs med dpag tu med pa dag yod/ pad+ma de dag kyang 'dab ma stong pa/ chu mngon par brtol nas gyen du dpag tshad brgyad bcur 'phags pa ste/ dadu
99b8(mdo sde): las kyang 'od zer 'bum 'byung bar byed cing / gyen du dang thur du yang 'od zer stong 'byung bar byed la/ de bzhin du phyogs thams cad du yang 'od zer stong stong 'byung bar byed pa'i
100a1(mdo sde): phyir// 'jig rten gyi khams de yang mig mangs risu bris pa rin po che'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ rin po che'i skud pas brgyan pa/ mig mangs
100a2(mdo sde): ris thams cad du yang / rin po che las byas pa'i shing ljon pa dag skyes par gyur pa/ gyen du dpag tshad bdun khri bdun stong mngon par 'phags pa/ thad ka ra ni dpag
100a3(mdo sde): tshang brgyad khri bzhi stong du yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / lo ma rab tu song ba'o// rin po che'i shang re re las kyang nor bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu zo ba tsam dag rab tu 'phyang ngo // 
100a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing den shing ljon pa de dag kyang gras med dpag tu mdo// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni pa dwa'i 'dab ma de dag dang / nor bu de dag gi 'od kyis rtag
100a5(mdo sde): tu snang bar byas pa ste/ 'od de yang bcom lda na 'das de'i 'od kyis mag mog por byas pa'o// bya ngachub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go cha chen
100a6(mdo sde): bo de mthong ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam pa du ma rnam par 'phrul pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i ga
100a7(mdo sde): chas zhus pa bcom ldan 'das 'od dang / gsung gsal ba'i sgra de su'i ljags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des de la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi
100a8(mdo sde): phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs meng pa lnga stong 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
100b1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos
100b2(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ mthu de lta bu de ni de'i yino// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen
100b3(mdo sde): bkur bgyi ba'i sla du/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i go cha'i
100b4(mdo sde): lag par pad+ma chen po gcig byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di phul la/ nga'i tshig gis de bzhin du gsol cig/ de nas byang chub sems
100b5(mdo sde): dpa' de bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di lta ste/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig
100b6(mdo sde): gis lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar byed pa'am/ lag pa brkyang ba bskums par byed pa'i skad cig dang / thang tsag dang / yud tsam des 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang
100b7(mdo sde): bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug/ de bcom ldan 'das des de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
100b8(mdo sde): mgo ngos phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nya bang ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la
101a1(mdo sde): gnas sam zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa du ma rnam par 'phrul pa snyun gsol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma chen po 'di yang bco
101a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das des bskur ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad bzhi su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te/ bzhes nas kyang bka'
101a3(mdo sde): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das
101a4(mdo sde): nga lta lags so// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi chogs
101a5(mdo sde): can zhes bya ba zhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes latsha sa kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan sa lan zhes bya ba chos kyi skyes
101a6(mdo sde): byin nas btang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogasu rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me
101a7(mdo sde): tog tshogs kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho da dgazhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don yod rnam par gnon ces
101a8(mdo sde): bya btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje yang dag gnas shes bya ba yod/ ngan de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas me tog mngon par 'phags
101b1(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen me zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang
101b2(mdo sde): mngang chags na 'jig rten gyi khams can dan gyi phug ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i lus shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
101b3(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba kun tu bltas pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams rtsi lta bu zhes bya ba yod/ de na
101b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa don yod ming bsgrags dpal zhe sa bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa
101b5(mdo sde): rgyal chab don yod go cha bgos shes bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sman 'phags shes bya ba yad/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
101b6(mdo sde): yon tan mtha' yas brtson 'grus go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba yang dag par
101b7(mdo sde): byin pa'i bslab pa blangs zhes bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas brgyan ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems bskyed ma
101b8(mdo sde): thag tu sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyan mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
102a1(mdo sde): tshab lag na pad+ma zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
102a2(mdo sde): zla ba'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba btang // de'i
102a3(mdo sde): yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i 'od zer zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
102a4(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba bkod
102a5(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba yod/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa yon te na rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
102a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba yon tan thams cad rab gnas shes bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa
102a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
102a8(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal chab yon tan mtha' yas bsgrubs shes bya babatango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogasu reb grags shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gabye
102b1(mdo sde): ba mar me mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba spyod pa thams cad 'gyur zhes bya ba btang ngo // 
102b2(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams lhas brgyan ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 
102b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba ye shes 'byung gnas shes bya ba btangango // de'i yang 'dab chabs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shing thags bzang po can zhes bya
102b4(mdo sde): ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi 'byung ga na sa shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
102b5(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas shes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
102b6(mdo sde): pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba srid pa sal tsas bya ba btang ngo // de'i
102b7(mdo sde): yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa b+ha gir sa'i sras shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston/ 
102b8(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs thob ces bya ba btang // de'i yang ma chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba yod de/ 
103a1(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa
103a2(mdo sde): rgyal tsha ba bag tsha ba med pa zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod/ dan de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mchog gi 'od zer zhes bya
103a3(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshob lag na ye shes zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na
103a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams ut+pal zhes bya ba yod/ ngan de bzhi na gshegs pa ye shes ut+pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba ba shugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te
103a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab yu lan mi gnas pa zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang mang ba chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen
103a6(mdo sde): shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sem
103a7(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi 'byung gnas shes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sman lam
103a8(mdo sde): mtha' yas go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog rab gtor zhes bya ba btang
103b1(mdo sde): de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rgyal po rab gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 
103b2(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba chos 'phags shes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
103b3(mdo sde): khams nags tshal rab gnas shes bya ba yod/ don de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i phung po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan
103b4(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin
103b5(mdo sde): gsheg songs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bco ma ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
103b6(mdo sde): tshab khyad par blo gros shes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i 'od ces
103b7(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes pa chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu mthong zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mngab
103b8(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams lhun po brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 
104a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mes byir zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan bral zhes bya ba yod/ 
104a2(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' las bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab shin
104a3(mdo sde): tu yang dag par brtags kyi go cha zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad rab gnas shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
104a4(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab
104a5(mdo sde): sa rdzas shes bya ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen snang zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 
104a6(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
104a7(mdo sde): yon tan kun gyis brgyan ces bya ba yod// den de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' las zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang
104a8(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sman ces bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams byang chub yan lag brgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags
104b1(mdo sde): pas 'gro ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' legs par bsam pa sems pa khyad par blo gros shes bya
104b2(mdo sde): ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i blo gros shes bya ba yod/ da na de bzhin gshegs rin chen me tog 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs
104b3(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyad par byin zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
104b4(mdo sde): sprin ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ma tha' yas rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byung
104b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal chab dran pa rnyed ces bya ba ba ta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi kham sa me tog drangs kun tu g.yos pa shes bya ba yod/ ngan
104b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad mos pa'i go cha bgos shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
104b7(mdo sde): khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba btang // de'i lang mdab chags na/ 'jog rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi drang ba zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i gdugs ma
104b8(mdo sde): par 'phags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan med po ces bya ba btang // nga'i
105a1(mdo sde): yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen me tog ces bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs
105a2(mdo sde): te'atsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab khyu mchog ces bya ba ba ngo // de'i rlang ba chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
105a3(mdo sde): khams kun nas spos zhes bya ba yod/ de de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas
105a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab spos kyi glang ba che zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mang po chags ni/ 'ji garten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin
105a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa rin chen khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ ba com ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
105a6(mdo sde): mya ngan bral zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang mdag chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen sna tshogs rgyal tshab zhes bya ba yod/ nga ra de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'phag
105a7(mdo sde): pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab mtha' yas sbyar zhes bya ba btang
105a8(mdo sde): nga'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon du bgrod pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba
105b1(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab
105b2(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho dang gnas la chos kya
105b3(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba ye shes rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying
105b4(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba yod/ don de bzhin gshegs pa ka l-ing ka'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho dang gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas bya
105b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'ji ga rten gyi khams bang ba zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin
105b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab zla ba
105b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho
105b8(mdo sde): zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mes byin zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na// 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung
106a1(mdo sde): gnas zhes bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te// bcom
106a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu bde ba zhes bya ba yod/ dan de
106a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
106a4(mdo sde): mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyi phreng ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
106a5(mdo sde): pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsha na nga gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig bzangs shes
106a6(mdo sde): bya ba btingo // de'i yang mdab chags na// 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ga
106a7(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab brag ces bya ba btang // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba 'phags pa zhes
106a8(mdo sde): bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
106b1(mdo sde): stobs brtan zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 'od ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid rgyal po zhes
106b2(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyod pa khyad par can zhes bya bta // de'i yang mdab chags na
106b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mtho ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu'i blo gros zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
106b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyu dag pa zhe sa bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de
106b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'a ngas des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba kha
106b6(mdo sde): lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i me tog ces bya ba bzhugs
106b7(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshongs bon 'chang zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten
106b8(mdo sde): gyi khams bzang po zhes bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i bzhed ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa
107a1(mdo sde): rgyal chab dri ma med rnam par 'tho shes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad ces bya ba yod/ de na
107a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bkod pa du
107a3(mdo sde): ma zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan dang gnod pa thams cad yongasu spangs shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phan bzhed ces
107a4(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang glang po che dpal zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang radang
107a5(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan mtha las yong su rdzogs shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin ga shegs pa shin tu yang brtags pa'i go cha zhes bya ba
107a6(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog gi bkod pa zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags
107a7(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mnyam pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
107a8(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na// 'jig rten gyi khams bzod pa zhes bya ba yod// den de bzhin
107b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa ut+pa la'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba rtag tu brtson zhes bya ba btangango // de'i
107b2(mdo sde): yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 
107b3(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab zla ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang dub tu lung
107b4(mdo sde): bstan te btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang bar byas shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas pa'i lhun po spos kyi rgyal po
107b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na ye shes zhes bya ba bta // nga
107b6(mdo sde): yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya ba yod/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
107b7(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba bdud rtsi'i dbyangs shes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs dkar zhes bya ba
107b8(mdo sde): long / de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang brtson pa
108a1(mdo sde): mi gtong zhes bya ba btang // de'i yab mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyes
108a2(mdo sde): pa dang / bud med 'gyur bar mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshabang ro mtha' yas
108a3(mdo sde): bya ba btang // de'i yang 'dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig pa zhes bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ che
108a4(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na spos shes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten
108a5(mdo sde): gyi khams tsan dan gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la
108a6(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po 'od zer du ma zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu spos shes
108a7(mdo sde): bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mngon par 'phags pa rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub
108a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal chab rin po zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas mtshan zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can
108b1(mdo sde): kun gyi sems kyi mos pa'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dang
108b2(mdo sde): dpon chen po zhes bya ba ba ngo // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan ma med pa'i nga ro zhes bya
108b3(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos thams cad dben par gnas pa zhes bya ba btango // de'i
108b4(mdo sde): yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas me tog brgyan ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhi na gshegs pa ye shes sbas pa'i dpal zhes bya ba
108b5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ste/ na te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyu la tsha ba ye shes 'od zer zhes bya ba bta // de'i lang
108b6(mdo sde): mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog rgyas pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i dbyangs kyi rango zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'jo
108b7(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig bzangs shes bya ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
108b8(mdo sde): khams brtan po zhes bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
109a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab legs pa'i blo zhes byang bta'o// de'i yang mnga' chags na/ 'jig rteran gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba yod/ der
109a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba skar ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba
109a3(mdo sde): btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa kun gyi khyu mchog ston ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 
109a4(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rna ba'i me tog ces bya ba btangango // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten
109a5(mdo sde): gyi khams bden pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gsha gas pa don grub ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ga zhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
109a6(mdo sde): nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba btangango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs
109a7(mdo sde): pa 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab kun dga' bo zhes bya ba btang // de'i
109a8(mdo sde): yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gnod pa med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas pa chos kyang
109b1(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog dpal zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba
109b2(mdo sde): yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yod pas rgyags pa yang dag bcom zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
109b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyal po'i khyu mchog ces bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin pabye
109b4(mdo sde): pa ye shes kyi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab me tog kun tu bltas shes
109b5(mdo sde): bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rte na gyi khams me tog sna tshogs zhes bya ba long /  na de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes
109b6(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rnam par 'byed ces bya ba btang // de'i yang
109b7(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu yangs pa zhes bya ba yad/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i rtog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang
109b8(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba rin chen rtog ces bya ba btangango // de'i yang mngang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma 'jigs med ces
110a1(mdo sde): bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stor te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang dub sems
110a2(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal chab bzang po'i dpal zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dra ba can zhes bya ba yod/ de ra de bzhin gshegs pa dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya ba
110a3(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od gsal zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
110a4(mdo sde): khams 'od ces bya ba yod/ de na bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chas kya
110a5(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab tshangs pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba btang // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig
110a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams mngon par bgrod pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
110a7(mdo sde): ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bdud rtsi'i dbyangs shes bya ba btang // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dmigs pa med ces bya ba yod de/ 
110a8(mdo sde): na bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa kun la dgyes par mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang
110b1(mdo sde): thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bta // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu bsgrags shes bya ba yod de/ der de bzhin gshegs pa sems
110b2(mdo sde): can thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i go
110b3(mdo sde): cha zhes bya ba btang // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jigs rten gyi khams rtag tu bzod ldan zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par 'phrul pa mtha'
110b4(mdo sde): yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kya nga ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dang / nga rgyal tshab spobs pa mi chos pa zhes bya ba bta
110b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu mthong zhes bya ba yod/ ngan de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad gzigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 
110b6(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan ma med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na
110b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu blta zhes bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad gzigs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
110b8(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par dag pa'i mig ces bya ba btang // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad
111a1(mdo sde): 'azung sa bya ba yong/ ngan bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mthar las 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshamang gnas la chos ca stor te/ bcom ldan
111a2(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba btango // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dral zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin
111a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa ye shes 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od kyi dkyil
111a4(mdo sde): 'khor tsam zhes bya ba btang // nga'i yang mdab chags na/ 'ji garten gyi khams ut+pa las rab tu khebs pa zhes bya ba yo de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mchog ces bya
111a5(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ ma ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chub ut+mapadamar po'i dpal zhes bya ba btang // 'jig rten
111a6(mdo sde): gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+mas rab tu khebs pa zhes bya ba yid/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phyogasu 'phags pa shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
111a7(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba phyogs kyi lhun po zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pa
111a8(mdo sde): tog gis rab tu khengs pa zhesang ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas
111b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yid gnyis thams cad yang dag bcom zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mar me zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin
111b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa sems can gyi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab sred med kyi bu zhes bya ba
111b3(mdo sde): btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang
111b4(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba bde 'byung zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chag sa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba'i dpal zhes
111b5(mdo sde): bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi me zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
111b6(mdo sde): rgyal tshab mchog gi nor bu nar zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mnga' med ces bya ba
111b7(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig
111b8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams nges 'dren ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang storan te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub
112a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab sman pa'i mchog ces bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kha dog med ces bya ba yod de/ de de bzhin
112a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa tha dad pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab tha mi dang bu spyod pa zhes bya ba
112a3(mdo sde): btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu kha dog ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas grags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho gang
112a4(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
112a5(mdo sde): bstan to zhes bya ba nas btang zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyaro// de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig tu na gyi khams mtsho can zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin pargya
112a6(mdo sde): pa tsan dan gyi gsung gi dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes spos kyi dpal zhes bya
112a7(mdo sde): ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpe mad dpal zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas dpe med me tog 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba
112a8(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba yang dag 'phags shes bya ba btang // nga'i yang mdab chags na// 'jig
112b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rin chen ldan zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
112b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba sdom pa la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs can zhes bya ba yod/ de na nga
112b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa zla ba 'phags pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpar rgyal cheb zla ba zhes bya ba
112b4(mdo sde): btang ngo // / bam po bdun pa// de'i yang mdang chag sa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho zhes bya ba yod de/ 
112b5(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhu gas te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bca ma ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mya ngan
112b6(mdo sde): med pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lus mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs
112b7(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab brag ces bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
112b8(mdo sde): dga' ba'i spos shes bya ba lod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa skyo med 'gyur bar mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des
113a1(mdo sde): byang dub sepas dpa' rgyal chab yongs sgrags nyon mongs yang dag bcom zhes bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
113a2(mdo sde): khams yon tan kun la rab tu gnas shes bya ba yod/ nga na de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bco
113a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang du ba sems dpa' rgyal ba'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ bta ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du snga
113a4(mdo sde): ma bzhin du sbyar ro// nga'i yang mdab chags na// 'jig rten gyi khams phun sum tshogs pa kun la rab tu gnas shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa snyan pa'i
113a5(mdo sde): ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sem sa dpa' rgyal tsha chos 'phags shes bya ba bta // de
113a6(mdo sde): yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa'i blo gros shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan bral zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chu
113a7(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rin chen me shes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ btango zhes bya
113a8(mdo sde): nga'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyar// de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snyan pa zhes bya ba yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal
113b1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcod ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' me tog rgyal po zhes bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang bdang chags na/ 'jig
113b2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams me tog kun tu bkram zhes bya ba longad/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog rab tu gtor ba'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
