113b3(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chang spos kyi dpal zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khabs rnam par bsgrags pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na
113b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa kun nas spos kyi 'od zer ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba ngas 'byung
113b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bta // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mdab chags na// 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs ldananas bya ba yod// der de bzhir gshegs pa spyan lud ces bya ba
113b6(mdo sde): dazhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab smon lam chen po zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 
113b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'od 'phro can ces bya ba yod / der de bzhin gshegs pa 'od gtang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
113b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab sbyin bsreg byas pa'i 'od ces bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od lhun po zhes bya
114a1(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ri rab lta bu zhes bya ba btangango // de'i yang
114a2(mdo sde): mngang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen snang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
114a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen byin zhes bya ba ba ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu bdug spos bdugs shes bya ba yod/ de na
114a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa mtshan gnyis gtsug tor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gnyis
114a5(mdo sde): 'od ces bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ btango zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyor// de'i yang mngab chags na
114a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams srid pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi khyu mchog rnam par gnon ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
114a7(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab srid pa gsum zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya
114a8(mdo sde): ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
114b1(mdo sde): tshang mi 'jigs sbyin zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu dmigs pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha' rigs kyi khyu mchog
114b2(mdo sde): ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsho ba lag pa can zhes bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig
114b3(mdo sde): rten gyi khams bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zad mi shes pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'dra
114b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des/ byang chub sems dpa' 'byu nga ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
114b5(mdo sde): byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ btang nga las bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbyararo// de'i yang mngang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu yong su spangs shes
114b6(mdo sde): bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spos rab gtong zhe
114b7(mdo sde): bya ba bta // nga'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la rlo
114b8(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' yul la mi gnas pa zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgra rnam par sprugs shes
115a1(mdo sde): bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
115a2(mdo sde): 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sbron pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba yod
115a3(mdo sde): de na de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab tu gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab pa rA dzAd
115a4(mdo sde): zhes bya bdang // nga'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba long/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs
115a5(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom lnga na 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' blo gros dpe med ces bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig
115a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rab tu dga' byed ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan kun gyi 'byung gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ btso
115a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid go cha zhes bya ba btango // nga'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba
115a8(mdo sde): yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas rin chen ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sem
115b1(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi spyod pa zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de// ngan de bzhin gshegs pa ma
115b2(mdo sde): 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgrogs pa zhes bya ba dngango // de'i yang mang ba
115b3(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyi phreng ba bkod pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'phags pa'i 'od kyis gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho
115b4(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab legs byin zhes bya ba ba ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
115b5(mdo sde): pad+ma zhes bya ba yod/ de ra de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mar byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang dub sem
115b6(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab sangs rgyas chos 'byung zhes bya ba ba ngo // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos rab tu macom
115b7(mdo sde): ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba ye shes ngal ba 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang // de'i yang mngab
115b8(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ku mu ngas rab tu khangs zhes bya ba yod/ ngan de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba tog gi 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston
116a1(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ri rang byin zhes bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang ma chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa zhes bya
116a2(mdo sde): ba yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi glang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya
116a3(mdo sde): dbata // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang
116a4(mdo sde): bston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems da pa'i rgyal tshab bdud rtsi'i sgra zhes bya ba btang // de'i mang ba chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos ldan zhes bya ba
116a5(mdo sde): yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma portsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang me tog
116a6(mdo sde): ces bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
116a7(mdo sde): gnas la chos kyang stor te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyi bos byin zhes bya ba ba // de'i yang mad chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsam pa/ 
116a8(mdo sde): dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
116b1(mdo sde): rgyal tshab mig b.rangs shes bya ba bta // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen snying po zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rim chen brtsegs shes bya
116b2(mdo sde): nga bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab shin tu mthong zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mngang chags na/ 'a ga/ 
116b3(mdo sde): gyi khams mdzangs pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzangs mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
116b4(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab sangs rgyas shes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde mchog ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bang mdzad ces bya ba
116b5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la kyang ston te/ bam ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bde ba 'i rgyal po zhes byung btango // de'i yang ma chags na/ 'jig
116b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rang gnas shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
116b7(mdo sde): 'das ngas byang chung sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba bta // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod/ der de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi rtog
116b8(mdo sde): tsas bya po ba 'gas te/ mtsho 'ang gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das sa byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab ku tu 'a ces bya ba // daring ya chags ma lag da kyil
117a1(mdo sde): dga' ba'i spos shes bya ba yod/ der de bzhir gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas shes bya bzhugs te/ 'jo'ang ba'as la chos kyang stong
117a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang yon tan 'byung zhes bya bab ngo // de'i 'ang sangab chabs na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bltan sdug ces bya ba yod/ der de bcar ba
117a3(mdo sde): pa yon tan ldan thams cad 'byung ba'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stor te/ bcom ldan 'das ris byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan
117a4(mdo sde): bya ba bang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de'i yang mngang chags ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs
117a5(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang sbyin mos shes bya ba dang ngo // 'dzab rjen gyi khams de'i yang mang
117a6(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi drangs kun tu khebs shes bya ba yod / de na de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma 'chang 'asabya pa bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston
117a7(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang sbrar 'chums ma yin zhes bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi 'bas rin chen drangs kun tu khebs
117a8(mdo sde): bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
117b1(mdo sde): chang grong khyer sgrogs shes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal
117b2(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi khom thams cad 'gyur bad ces bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang
117b3(mdo sde): mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod/ ded de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang stong te/ 
117b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba ba ngo // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'ji garter gyi khams dpanga'i rigs shes bya ba yod/ ngar
117b5(mdo sde): nga bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'a ngas des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang rin chen lhun pa
117b6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mngab chags// 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba yod/ nga na de bzhin gshegs pa na pakha'i rna cha gdug 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyal
117b7(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal 'asu ba ba btango // de'i yang
117b8(mdo sde): mdab chags ma/ 'jig rten gyi khar sa mngon du 'gros pa zhes bya ba yod/ de nge bzhir gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i sgra 'as bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gnyis la chos kyang stor te/ bcom
118a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das ngas byang du ba sems dpa' rgyal cadu mya ngan pad ces byang btang // de'i yang dang rags// 'jig rten gyi 'bas spos rigs bas 'as bya
118a2(mdo sde): yod de de nang bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces byung bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rang pa ngan med pa'i
118a3(mdo sde): dpal 'as bya babadang // nga'i yangang dang chags na/ 'dzag rten gyi khabs shin tu rnam dag ces bang yod/ der de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po'is bya bzhugs te/ 'tsho'ang
118a4(mdo sde): gnas la chos kyang stor te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rigs btsun zhes bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang mad chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
118a5(mdo sde): rab snang zhes bya ba yod/ der de bzhin gshegs pa rinachen me tog sna tshogs me tog kun tu rgyas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcopa
118a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab blo gros mtha' yas shes bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang mang ba chags na/ 'jig rteran gyi khams mthu dpal zhes bya ba yod/ der de ba'i
118a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa mchog gi tshogs can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ba lang bdag ces bya ba bang / 
118a8(mdo sde): nga'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen me tog ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med rdul bral rnam par grol ba'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang
118b1(mdo sde): gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od ces bya ba bta // nga'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya ba
118b2(mdo sde): long ngo / den de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ong gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rang rnam par sna
118b3(mdo sde): byed ces bya ba btangango // nga'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rir chen khang pa'isu bya ba bzhugs te/ 'a
118b4(mdo sde): zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang du ba sems dpa' rgyal chab shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba btango // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
118b5(mdo sde): khams snying po can zhes bya ba yod/ de de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'ang gnas la chos kyang stor te/ bcom ldan 'ang
118b6(mdo sde): ngas byang du sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas bir zhes bya ba bta ngo // nga'i yang mdab chags/ 'jig rten gyi khams grol ba zhes bya ba yod/ de ra de bzhin gshegs pa grol ba'i 'od zer
118b7(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab byams pa zhes bya ba bta // de'i lang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
118b8(mdo sde): khams me tog rang gtor ces bya ba yod de na de bzhir gshegs pa me tog 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems
119a1(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab me tog gi gdugs me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya
119a2(mdo sde): ba longade na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog gdugs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gser
119a3(mdo sde): gdugs shes bya ba bang // nga'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma can zhes bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa ngan yong gi cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho
119a4(mdo sde): gnas la chos kyang ston to/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab log pa'i gocha bags shes bya ba ba ti // nga'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi kham
119a5(mdo sde): me tog can zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
119a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skyed byed ces bya bat+ta ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gabye
119a7(mdo sde): pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bla na
119a8(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas/ btango zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin du sbya ro// de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog gi
119b1(mdo sde): rgyal ma cha zhes bya ba yod/ de nang bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang stod te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ca
119b2(mdo sde): mig rnab dag ces bya ba bangango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' las tshogs can zhes bya ba bdug te
119b3(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rigs mtha' yas zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gas
119b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ ba com ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab sde
119b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin ga gas pa thogs pa meng pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba bzhugs
119b6(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'das pa rnam par gnon ces bya ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi ba
119b7(mdo sde): srid pa med ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro kun rnam par 'joms mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
119b8(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu yang dag brtags kyi go cha zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ling gnyis can zhes bya ba yod/ de na nga bzhin gshegs pa
120a1(mdo sde): yid gnyis yang dag 'joms par mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
120a2(mdo sde): tshab mthong ma thag tu nges pa'i gor zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes mchog ces bya ba yod/ der de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan pa bad pa'i
120a3(mdo sde): nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshad rnam par bltas pa'i nga ro las bya ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags
120a4(mdo sde): na'ajig rten gyi khams yon tan rab gnas shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
120a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab gom pa mtha' yas rnam par gnod ces bya ba btang / de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi bar sa ra
120a6(mdo sde): cher rab gnas shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
120a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tsha rdo rje rnam par gnon ces bya ba btang // de'i yang mad nga chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yod/ de nang bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma mngon par 'phag
120a8(mdo sde): pa'i dngal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rin chen ces bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang mdab chags
120b1(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma 'byung zhes bya ba yod/ der de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen pachog ces bya bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stor te/ bcom ldan 'ang
120b2(mdo sde): nges byang chung sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs mchog ces bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams legs 'byung zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
120b3(mdo sde): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i go cha thogs pa med ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges bang chub sems dpa'
120b4(mdo sde): rgyal tshab rdul bral sde zhes bya ba bta // de'i lang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong mtha' yas zhes bya ba
120b5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin/ tu gnon ces bya ba btango // de'i 'am chags na// 'dzag
120b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams rnam dag ces bya ba yod/ de ra nga bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub
120b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab lhun po chen po zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba sgron ma zhes bya ba yod/ de rang bzhin gshegs pa ny-i ma sgror
120b8(mdo sde): ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab nyi ma sgron ma mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal 'as bya ba
121a1(mdo sde): pa 'o// nga'i yang ya ba chags/ 'jig ca gyi 'am sa tshor nga dung chosasu ba yodang / da rang ngab gshags pa lags 'gyur
121a2(mdo sde): bya ba bdugs te/ 'tsho'ang gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang dri meng 'byung ba'i dpal 'du bya babang ngo // nga'i yang mang
121a3(mdo sde): chags/ 'jig rten gyi khams skar mda' zhes bya ba yong/ de na de bzhir gshegs pa skar mda' smon pa las bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang ga'asal chos kyang stor te/ 
121a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chang 'ang la ba'i blo gros shes bya ba btang // de'i yang mngang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams le shes 'byung gnas zhes bya ba
121a5(mdo sde): yod/ par de ba'i gshegs pa gong na med pa'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kya nga ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dang
121a6(mdo sde): rgyal chang yor tar 'byung gnas shes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i gdugs shes bya ba yod/ de rang bzhin gshegs pa rgyal
121a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal chabarda sgra zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 
121a8(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
121b1(mdo sde): 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs shes bya ba yod/ de ra de bzhin gshegs pa
121b2(mdo sde): phyogs kyi sbyon pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab phyogs snang zhes bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang
121b3(mdo sde): mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom
121b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das des bang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thu bo zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab gnas shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
121b5(mdo sde): sang+ge'as bya nga bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chung sems dpa nga rgyal chang bag tshang med pa zhes byababang ngo // 
121b6(mdo sde): yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 
121b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs
121b8(mdo sde): pa rnam par gzigs shes bya ba dazugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sprin ces bya ba dang ngo // de'i mdab chags
122a1(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khabs kur 'dzin 'asu bya ba yod/ dedang ba gshegs pa ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba dugs/ yang
122a2(mdo sde): chos kyang stor te/ bcom ldan 'das des ba dung sems dpa' rgyal chang rtsi'i rgyal pozhes bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal bzang po las
122a3(mdo sde): bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rab
122a4(mdo sde): shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang mngab cha gas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba yo de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yos pa zhes bya ba
122a5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gzhes la chos kyang stor/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab dug sngas shes bya bdang ngo // de'i yang yadang chags na
122a6(mdo sde): 'jig rter gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod/ nga rang bzhin gshegs pa spos pa chog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'dra
122a7(mdo sde): ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chang spos dpal zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang ra dang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos dpal zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
122a8(mdo sde): phyag na spos mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang
122b1(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams can ngan gyi bsrung zhes bya ba yod/ don de bzhin gshegs paca ngan 'ang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'anganams la chos kya na
122b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang dub sems dpa' rgyal chab dpal sbas shes bya babata // de'i yang radab chags na/ 'jig rteran gyi khams rin chen dra bas khebs shes bya ba yong / ngan
122b3(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus mtha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang dub sems dpa' rgyal chab blo gros mtha'
122b4(mdo sde): las zhes byab pa ngo // de'i yang bdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod/ de nang bzhir gshegs pa pad+ma 'jigs byed me tog mngon par 'a
122b5(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'angaganas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chu sems dpa' rgyal chang dungangs mtha' yas nga ro zhes
122b6(mdo sde): bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang byed ces bya ba yod/ de ra de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen dra ba can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang
122b7(mdo sde): gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang dpas byin zhes bya ba dang ngo // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba
122b8(mdo sde): sbyor pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chubs
123a1(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab brjed med nga ro zhes bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsan dar gyi bsung zhes bya ba yod/ de na de ba'i
123a2(mdo sde): pa d+ya ga na spos mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang 'byor pas byin zhes bya babang
123a3(mdo sde): de'i yang mang 'a chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yidang bral zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba thams cad nye bar sgrub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'pho zhing gnas la chos kyang
123a4(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyu la chad par 'dod ces bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod/ nga
123a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa thams cad ston ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho dang gnyis la kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chang smon lam mtha' yas
123a6(mdo sde): shes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yongs bsgrags don yod ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes
123a7(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab go cha mtha' yas shes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhesdu ba pa yod
123a8(mdo sde): ngan de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang gtsug na nor bu zhes bya ba
123b1(mdo sde): dngango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas bkod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
123b2(mdo sde): gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab thogs pa med pa'i snying stobs go cha zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
123b3(mdo sde): pad+ma'i gdugs gcig pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgya
123b4(mdo sde): tshab rin chen tog ces bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho
123b5(mdo sde): 'ang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab na mkha' rnam dag spyod pa zhes bya ba ba ngo // de'i yang mngang chags na/ 'jig rten
123b6(mdo sde): gyi khams bzang byed ces bya ba yod de/ de nad bzhin gshegs pa bzang po mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'chi zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sa
123b7(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshang bzang po dbyangs shes bya ba dang ngo // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mar me byed ces bya ba yod// de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog mtha' yas shes bya
123b8(mdo sde): ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'jigags la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal cha 'a khyu mchog ces bya babang ngo // nga'i 'angam dang chags na/ 'jig rnga
124a1(mdo sde): gyi khams me tog dri zhim 'as bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa spyar rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
124a2(mdo sde): 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig bzangs shes bya bab ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rab gnas shes bya ba yod/ de na de ba'i na gshegs pa
124a3(mdo sde): kha lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya tsho zhes bya ba ba ngo // nga'i yang mngab chags na/ 
124a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams tshang tshogs mtha' yas shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston
124a5(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tshad med blo gros shes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag 'byung zhes bya
124a6(mdo sde): nga yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa phas ma pham pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab
124a7(mdo sde): phas ma pham pa zhes bya ba bta // nga'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul zhes bya ba yod/ ngan de bzhin gshegs pa mngon rtogs ces bye ba bzhugs te/ 
124a8(mdo sde): zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos 'dra
124b1(mdo sde): shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mtha' yas mu med spos shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems
124b2(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshang spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bting // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams grong khyer zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnang
124b3(mdo sde): ngag rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron ma 'chang zhes bya ba btangango // de'i yang mdab
124b4(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mchog ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 
124b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab / na tu rab gnas shes bya ba btang // de'i lang mdab chag sa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod
124b6(mdo sde): nga na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtul
124b7(mdo sde): pas byin zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang mda' chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po rnam dag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
124b8(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab rin chen lhun po zhes bya ba btangango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mdzes pa
125a1(mdo sde): zhes bya ba 'ang / ngar bzhin gshegs pa mdzes pa'i dpa la 'as bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho'ang ga'as la kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas bya
125a2(mdo sde): sems dag tu la chab rjes paca po sa zhes byab ba //  yang rab chags/ 'jig rten gyi bams dri' ba nas kyang yad/ ngan pa' gshegs pam
125a3(mdo sde): dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal cha ba tshangs pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba btang // nga'i lang mdab chags
125a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te
125a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab bang pos byin zhes bya ba btang // nga'i yang mngang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba
125a6(mdo sde): yod/ de nga bzhir gshegs pa yon tan mtha' yas 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgya
125a7(mdo sde): chab yon tan byin zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba
125a8(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes bsags shes bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig
125b1(mdo sde): rten gyi khams sna tshogs shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par bsam pa'i smon lam yongasu grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ 
125b2(mdo sde): ldan las ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab smon lam mtha' las shes bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khabs grong khyer brgyad pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba
125b3(mdo sde): yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stor te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa'
125b4(mdo sde): rgyal tshad lhun po rna ba dag ces bya ba btangango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes 'od ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes spos shes bya ba zhugs
125b5(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho 'di gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcor ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes labyung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang radab chags
125b6(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams khang pa zhes bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa khang pa sde zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang ga'as la kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub
125b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' rgyal tshab la shes rnam par sems shes bya ba btang // nga'i yang yangab chags no/ 'jig rten gyi khams ye shes spos shes bya ba yang / dar de bzhin gshegs pa la
125b8(mdo sde): shes brtsegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho ba gzhas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chang ye shes 'byung gnas shes byang bang ngo // 
126a1(mdo sde): yabang dang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs kyi lhun po zhes bya ba yod/ der de bzhin gshegs pa par mi mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang
126a2(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal cheb phyog su rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba btango // de'i rangar dang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi 'dra
126a3(mdo sde): yon tan rab gnas shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde bdag ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bco ldan 'das des byang chub sem
126a4(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bta ngo // de'i ya nga mdab chags// 'jig rten gyi khams grags dga' zhes bya ba yod/ da na de bzhin gshegs pa
126a5(mdo sde): rdul bral mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho gang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang mi mjed kyi bdag po zhes bya ba
126a6(mdo sde): btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i dngal zhes
126a7(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na// 'jig
126a8(mdo sde): rten gyi khams yon tan mtha' yas 'byung zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho
126b1(mdo sde): shing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
126b2(mdo sde): dga' ba zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin tshan mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang dub sems
126b3(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' ba zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams so sor bag yangs shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtsar
126b4(mdo sde): 'jug rtsom pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chung sems dpa' rgyal tshab rtag tu rnams pa'i go cha zhes bya ba
126b5(mdo sde): bang ngo // de'i yang radab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu so sor yang dag gnas shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer ba
126b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sa'i nga ro rgyal
126b7(mdo sde): po zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang bdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams du klung gang ga'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yod tan kun dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yong/ 
126b8(mdo sde): na de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad kyi sku yang dag par ston pa'i khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang
127a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bltas pa'i byang chug tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos shes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang
127a2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' des snang ba chen po des thong ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'ang
127a3(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od de dang / gsung gsal ba'i sgra 'di su'i lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi
127a4(mdo sde): phyogs char 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa stong dag 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes
127a5(mdo sde): bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang chu ba sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston te/ mthu lta bu 'di ni de'i yin// de nas
127a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis 'di skad ces gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das
127a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das da pazhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag 'gyi ba dang / bsnyen bskur bgyi dang / chos mnyan pa'i spadu/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad pa
127a8(mdo sde): bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig/ de nas bya brngub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu
127b1(mdo sde): nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi go cha bgos kyis/ pad+ma brgyad blangs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su gtor to// 
127b2(mdo sde): nas pad+ma de dag 'jig rten gyi bar dag las 'das nas/ rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa dang dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der so sor yang dag par 'khod do// 
127b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i 'khor bzhi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyis de dag mthong nas kyang ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la pad+ma
127b4(mdo sde): ngag gis lan gsum bskor ba byas nas spyan sngar 'khod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas pad+ma de dag la reg par mdzad nas/ reg pa tsam gyis pad+mad dag las kyang
127b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i lus ngag mngon par byung // byung na sa kyang bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa 'di nga ga gis mngon par bstod nas mi snang bar gyur to// 
127b6(mdo sde): bam po brgyad pa/ mtha' yas mkhyen mnga' gang zag khyu mchog gtso// rang byung mtha' las chos rnams thugasu chud// khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul mtha' yas rgya chen
127b7(mdo sde): gdang/ 'jig rten khams rnams kun tu snang bar mdzang // de dgas ngas rgyas kyi ni mtshan thos nas/ zhu ba'i khyang par kun tu zhu ba dang // sangs rgyas blta dang phyag kyang brgya
127b8(mdo sde): slad du/ mkhas pa de dag rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi mchis// byang chub go bgos dpa' bo gang mchis dag/ mi mdzad 'jig rten khamasu rab gnas pa// de dag skye ba gcig gis
128a1(mdo sde): thogs pa ste// dadag rang dang gzugs dang grags pas 'phags// dan na mams pa 'jugs dang // sas sa sad pa'i sadu la
128a2(mdo sde): shugs/ ngang rkub pa chog la ji ltar reg 'gyur ba// 'jig rten rna ba 'dren mchog la de dag nu// ci'i slad bangon du chos tshol bgyid ce ra// bdud rnangs gzhong dang byang du ba 'thob
128a3(mdo sde): sla du/ de ras zhu ba zhu pa'i sprul pa rnabs// gang yin de la shAkya thub pas gsungs// 'dren pas yang dag cig gis nga bstan nas// pi btog de yis cag rnapas thos gyur te// 
128a4(mdo sde): dga' 'ang bgul la rje su yi rang ras// bde gshegs phyag 'tshal de dag 'khod par gyur// sprul pa de dag der ni pi snang nas// gang dag de bzhir gshegs le'u ba ru// 
128a5(mdo sde): de ngag gang das pa chis shing ring 'i zhes// de nge 'khor kyang sU rnams zing zhes byed// 'khor rnams bzhi bong dag gus pa yas// rgyal ba la ri'u bar bi swA ste// de tshe 'jig
128a6(mdo sde): rten dgor po'i sprul pa sprul// de tshe dge slong kun dga' bzang po byung // dgon po zhu ba 'di'u de dag gang // zhus nas kyang de 'i gda' ba mthod gyur// de dag su lagasang dag su yi lags// 
128a7(mdo sde): ragor po bshang cing the tsom bsal du gsol// sngod lar dpa' bo ldan pa'i go cha ltos// de las byin gyis brlabs ras 'dir lhags te/ sharI phyogs kyi ri 'jig rten khams kyi tshul/ 
128a8(mdo sde): grangs pang dag ras de dag lhags pa yin// dpa' bo 'jig rten par phyir gang lhags pa// rnam par bltas nas dong bar gyur pa ste// bsar pa dag pa byang chub phyir spyod pa// de'i smon
128b1(mdo sde): la ma de ni de 'dra'o// de dag dge bas nges par sangs rgyas mthong // de dag 'dir ni de la sgying ri lug/ tshul khrims kyis kyang dman par mi 'gyur te// thos pa mang 'ang pha rol phyin pas
128b2(mdo sde): 'phags// de dag thabs shes pa la shin tu bslangs// mngal gyi gnas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur te// 'khor ba'i tshe na tshe rab sa// de dag chos kyi sems rgyud brjed pa 'gyur// rtag
128b3(mdo sde): tu sangs rgyas rnams dang mngon du 'brang // rtag tu 'phags pa rnams dang 'grogs par 'gyur// dpa' bo de yis sems can 'dir mthong rna bas// rtag tu de la rab tu 'byung ba 'thob// 
128b4(mdo sde): mthong ba thag tu dge bas de 'dra ste// gang dag gzhan pa brjo dpa de dag mang // dpa' bo de'i yon tan gang yod pa// mang du bsgrags kyang mthar thug 'gyur ba rang // dpa' bo
128b5(mdo sde): shin tu gnas pa de yi ming // de tshe bud med gang gis thos gyur pa// de ni phyin chad bud med dngos mi 'gyur// sems can dab pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// skyes pa bung med
128b6(mdo sde): gang gis ming thos shing // thos nas de la'ang dga' ba skyed byed la// sangs rgyas 'ang dar spor lam 'debs byed pa// lus zhig nas ni der yang skye bar 'gyur// ring yang dag par skye bar
128b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yin// skyes pa bung meng 'or te gnan yang rung // gang gis ming thos rnam zhig dang byed pa// thams cad byang chub ched las nyams mi 'gyur// gang dag gcer bu'i sems
128b8(mdo sde): tsad pa gtogs par// thos nas su zhig dga' ba skyer 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyis kyang de ni long ma gsungs// 'on kyang dag gi dang ldan par 'gyur// gang dag bsapa pas
129a1(mdo sde): yang thos pa ri// ji ltar rtsi yis skyor rnams sel byed pa'i// sems ca nga dag gis ri ngar mthong ba// byang dung ngon tu nges 'gyur the com meng // gang dab pal
129a2(mdo sde): sha'i 'dab thogs shing // de dang der ni rtse dag byed gyur na// de che kun nas sman gyi stobs kyisu// sus kyang der daM paM la tshig pi 'gyur// gang tshe sbrul gdug gzi brjid drag po yas// dug gang
129a3(mdo sde): de dag pa bdag byed 'gyur te// sa'i steng dkun tu stor byed de// de 'dra'i span brkos pas ni ci 'ag bya// sbrul gdug dri ri gang dag sngor byed pa// sbrel de thams cad 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur// 
129a4(mdo sde): ltar rdza sngar 'dra ba'i ngi ra ri// rang gis sangs rgyas mdzad pa byed par 'gyur// de'i tshe phyogs bcu dag tu bsgrags par// dpa' bong yi bong ni sus thos pa// de'i ming gis las ri
129a5(mdo sde): bye bung re ba gang zag la ri reg pa 'gyur// gang gis mthong dang sti stang byed ci sdos// de ra rgyal bas dge na nga gang sprul pa// kun dga' bzang po des raM bya ba des// rgyal
129a6(mdo sde): bas de skad bsgrags pa de 'dra ba// byang chub zhugs pa su mchis de la zhus// kun dga' bzang po go cha dpa' bo'i ming // 'jig rten khams 'dir lod ces ngas thos na// zhus pa med pa'i
129a7(mdo sde): yid kyis brjod par bya// de ltar bde bar gshegs pas zab bstan pa// rgyal ba'i byang chub yid ches dka' ba yis// sems can dge ba chung dang ldanang lhags// da ltar nga yis tshe ri cung zad
129a8(mdo sde): gnas/ kun dga' 'di na sems can mchog yod// de ring kho nar 'khor du lhags par gyur// 'jig rten mgon po gang dag 'dir lhags pa'i// go cha bsngags pa phyogs bcur bzlog
129b1(mdo sde): mi dus/ kun dga' bzang skyong rin cher 'byung gnas dang // dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang riring dpor bzang // yor tan sbas pa bakhas dang de bzhin du// dpa' ngo bdang spobs gang yin de la
129b2(mdo sde): chu zhesu bya pa dang ri du lha dang // bzang skyong de ba'ing dge slong ci 'dra rnams// ji ltar skyong gyur dge slong de dag ltos// de dag rnams kyi go cha dengs pa las// ngor yod ces ni yongasu bsgrags kyu
129b3(mdo sde): pa// de dag gis ri ngon long go cha bgos// de dag mthong ba'ang ngor long 'gyurarang yin// de dag bsnyen bkur byed pa smos ming dgos// kur dga' gang su dag gis de dag mthong // gang dag su
129b4(mdo sde): lis ring yang thos gyur pa// de dag dal yang byang chub dgos pa pang // de dag nang du'ang log par ltung mi 'gyur// de dag thams cad brtsor pas tshogs pa yin// de dag
129b5(mdo sde): thams cad shes pas tshogs par gyur// rtag tu du la khri ngas phung pos de rtag gnas// thams cad theg pa mchog la de ltar 'dun// kun dga' sangs rgyas zhing 'di
129b6(mdo sde): phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten de ltar gang dag su gnas pa// dpa' bod tso go cha 'dong gyur pa// de la rgyal bkur gyis bsngags pa brjod// gang gis bsngags brjod rgyal bde dag kyang / 
129b7(mdo sde): byang du sems dpa'ang tsha shes te// shAkya khyu mchog 'jig rten mgon po dang // byang chub zhugs pa'i dang 'bong dag lta'o// da bus nas kyang gsol ba bta 'gyur ba// mam
129b8(mdo sde): mi mdzang 'dag rtan lam sa mar// rgyal ba rnams kyi skul bstor du byas ngas// byang du ba sems dpa'ad dag thams ca lpags// ngam spong dag gi yang tshang thos dam/  du bang du
130a1(mdo sde): pachog tu dud btsub// gang dag ring nga 'dud pas byang chu zhugs// de dag rgyal bas byang chu ngag rung bstar// ngan par grangs yang dag dulas byas
130a2(mdo sde): ba dge bsgrubs pa gang dag su long pa// da pyor sdigs pa'i dus da nga dag // deng lhar cig sangs rgyas nga du lpags/ 'a yas byang chu ma dog 'di thong gyur kyang // dadzesems can pa
130a3(mdo sde): nga med/ gang dag phyi dus dge slong rnams 'byung ba// rtsu ba dang gtu ma dang shin tu rtsub pa yin// da tshe kun tu 'jigs pa thos rasu// yang dag yang du brtson 'grus stobs skyed cing // mu ge'i
130a4(mdo sde): dus su rngad rjer sbyin du byin// de dag rnams kyi spyir brtsub pa lin// de dag 'dil gus pa chubyas nas// byi dus 'jig sa pa chen po de'i tshe// srog kyang btang ras ngor ri
130a5(mdo sde): skar te/ nga yi chos pachog spel 'ang 'dzin par byed// dus de ni mi dpe'i las rnams kyi// spod la pa gnas kyang 'jig rten dag ra yod// 'dir las de dag ni byas pas // 
130a6(mdo sde): de yi cher brnyas pa'i rdul du 'gyur// de dag der ni 'di 'dri'i chos thos nas// de tshe der ri chos rin 'du shes 'gyur// chos 'di rgyal bas gsungs pa pa yin zhes// 'jig rten phyin ci lo
130a7(mdo sde): la kun dga' ltos// de tshe dge slong slob pas 'du byed la// rtag pa cung zad med ces sgo thob pas// de te mgo la me 'bar bzhin du rtogs// ra chi meng thob pa rab phyir ma lus btsal// bstan
130a8(mdo sde): 'di rab tu rnam par 'jig thong nas// de ni lha 'ang sdug bsngal dag tu gyur// de tshe 'jigs pa mthong ra mi rung zhes// da lta'i dus su shi yang du skam sems// bag cha rid pa'i sgrogs pa
130b1(mdo sde): sgrogs pa yis// drang srong ci deng ring bdag cag mthong // 'dre pa mchog gis la du lta byed cing // kye brgyal bas bshang ces yang ras// dge slong bsam gtar byed pa dag kyang bathong
130b2(mdo sde): dbang thob rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis mkhas gyur pa// 'di na ting 'dzin shes rab pha rol phyin// de dag phyi ma'i dus ji ltar mthong // sdig pa'i dge slong stobs dang ldan 'gyur zhib/ nga tshe tshul
130b3(mdo sde): ldan shin tu tsha reg cad 'gyur// gnas khang gnas pa tshegs kyis 'thob 'gyur zhing // ngo tshe lha yang shin tu mi dga' 'gyur// kye ma kye ma bstan pa rab tu 'jig/ gang gi don du de tsha
130b4(mdo sde): spyod pa/ de dag dge slong sdig pas char gcad 'gyur// bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur ba 'di la ltos// 'dir ni phan tshun kun tu dga' bar 'gyur// nges pa rnams la de dag sngags pon brjod
130b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas la ni 'khrug long byed pa dag/ de dag khyim nag na sa pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dge bsnyen pa dang 'dre bar byed/ gyur 'ang // de na de dag lag pa gcig tu byed/ 
130b6(mdo sde): rgyal ba'i bstan lam gus gyur rasu// byang chub mchog kyang spong bar byed par 'gyur// dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu 'che 'gyur te// de dag rtag tu ngas pa rnams kyis spangs
130b7(mdo sde): mchog mchag ma gyur ma rungs pa// de bzhir tshul khrims ldan pa rnam par spong // nga che tshul khrims ldan pa dpyas 'gyur zhing // nga tshe dge slong sdig pas brnam tshul 'gyur// 'jigs chen
130b8(mdo sde): phyin ci log gi dasu ra// skyob thong bos ngag kyang yod par gyis// bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la brtsor 'grus skyed// de che 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// sdig pa'i dge slong ma
131a1(mdo sde): dang 'phrang ma byed// de'i tshe na sdug bsngal gnas par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bltas pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snying stobs kyi
131a2(mdo sde): go cha dgos// 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis lag pa bskums pa rkyong bar byed pa 'am/ brkyang ba sgrub par byed pa'i skad cig des/ de nas pa sdang bar gyur
131a3(mdo sde): ras/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir 'ongs te/ de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
131a4(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das la gnong nga chung ngab/ nyam dang nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs pa
131a5(mdo sde): bde bar rig pa la gnas sam zhes/ de bzhin gshegs ba bdud thams cad la sku kun tu ston pa'i khyu mchog snyun gsol lagaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
131a6(mdo sde): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das de skur mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ 'gyur ba mi mnga' 'am/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lag so// 'jig rten gyi
131a7(mdo sde): khams de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan ldan zhes bya ba long / den de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan med pa ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
131a8(mdo sde): kyang storan te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab tshangs dbyangs pa ro zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzin med ces bya
131b1(mdo sde): ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan pa med pa'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
131b2(mdo sde): mtshan nyid gcig pas mchod ces bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams pa tshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bad+ma'i
131b3(mdo sde): mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang dub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma rab tu gtor ba'i rkang pa zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang
131b4(mdo sde): mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i rgyal mtsha da zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rin ce na 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ga
131b5(mdo sde): la chos kyang stod te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sem sa dpa' rgyal tshab sna tshogs brtsegs las bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khabs 'ja
131b6(mdo sde): pa'is bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul meng blo gros shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal
131b7(mdo sde): cang du khyud 'dzin ces bya ba btang // de'i yang me pa chags na/ 'jig rten gyi b.ras me tog ces bya ba yod de/ de nang bzhin gshegs pa ye shes pa tog 'byung zhes byang ba
131b8(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des bya dung sems dpa' rgyal tshangs 'dzin rang gnas shes bya babatango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig ca
132a1(mdo sde): gyi khams mkha' rnam par dag ces bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tshal
132a2(mdo sde): gnas la chos kyang stong // bcom ldan 'as ngas byang chub sems dang rgyal chabar mchen gdugs shes bya ba btang // de'i lang ra dab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan
132a3(mdo sde): med pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
132a4(mdo sde): ut+pal zhes bya ba btang // nga'i lang mdab chags na/ ladza garten gyi khams bde ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rdul med khyu mchog ces bya ba ba
132a5(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan la ngas des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sems da pa' med ces bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang mdab chags
132a6(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad so sor bag langs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang
132a7(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba zab mo 'gyur byed ces bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan 'byung gnas
132a8(mdo sde): zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin ga shegs pa yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'as
132b1(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'gro ba 'dzin ces bya ba btangango // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
132b2(mdo sde): dga' ba 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshad rnam par rgyal ba'i dang
132b3(mdo sde): bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gnod med ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'jigs par gshegs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs
132b4(mdo sde): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'ang sa des ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab dpa' ba zhes bya ba ba ngo // de'i 'ang radang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
132b5(mdo sde): khams ut+pal dmar pos khebs pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de ba zhin gshegs pa spos kyi rgyags mdzad ces bya ba bzhug sa te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
132b6(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub seras dpa' rgyal tshab spos mchog lhun po zhes bya ba bta // de'i yang radab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi kha lo bsgyur ba zhes bya ba yod/ de ra nga bzhin gshegs
132b7(mdo sde): pa kun nas gzigs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyab tshag rtul ba mtha' yas zhes bya ba bang ngo // nga'i
132b8(mdo sde): yang mngang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshogs chen zhes bya ba yod/ den de nganani gshegs pa mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcor ldan
133a1(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal dang rnam par gdon ces bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang rangang rags da/ 'jig rjer gyi khams 'jig su rung bas mi 'jig
133a2(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba yod/ de rang bzhir gshegs pa pi 'jigs pa brnyas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang dub sems dpa' rgyal tshang
133a3(mdo sde): phyogasu rab grags zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba zhes bya ba yod/ der de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba sgror pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing
133a4(mdo sde): gnas la ngos kyang stor te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya ba dang ngo // de'i yang radab chags na/ 'jig rteran gyi khams rab snang sa
133a5(mdo sde): bya ba yong / de ra de ba'i ragashegs pa mi sbyor zhes bya ba bdugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ ba com ldan 'das nges byang du ba sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'dzin
133a6(mdo sde): bya bang ngo // de'i yang bdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'od ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'bar 'os bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ 
133a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rnam par sgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang ra dang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi 'bas rab 'dren zhes bya ba yod/ de na da
133a8(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gyer du gshegs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shes rab mchog ces
133b1(mdo sde): bya ba bang ngo // nga'i yang dadab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mchog gi nor bu zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang
133b2(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rab kyi blo gros shes bya ba btangango // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje 'byung zhes bya ba yod/ de ra nga
133b3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gdon ces bya ba bdugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yon tan 'byung gnas shes
133b4(mdo sde): bya ba btang // de'i yang rangab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams nga ro can zhes bya ba yod/ de na da bzhin gshegs pa la shes dbang phyug rgyal po 'as bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ong ga sa la
133b5(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang du/ ba sems dpa' rgyal chang srang med kyi bu zhes bya ba btang // de'i lang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpa' 'byung
133b6(mdo sde): bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sem
133b7(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshang spongan la rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba btangango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde 'byung zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa bde re chog
133b8(mdo sde): ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'di gas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dkar rgyal zhes bya ba ba ngo // de'i yang yadang chags ra/ 'dzag rna
134a1(mdo sde): gyi bar sa skya reng zhes bya ba yod/ de ra de bzhin gshegs pa yon ta rgyal po'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'jo zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan
134a2(mdo sde): 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba dang dpor zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po su ba pa yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dpal bzang po
134a3(mdo sde): sa bya ba bzhugs te// 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang bdab chags na/ 
134a4(mdo sde): 'jig rter gyi khams tshas pa'i dpal zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs nga ro zhes byang ba'u gas te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang stod te// btsa
134a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba rin can dang / la zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog can zhes bya ba yod/ de dang
134a6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me tog ces bya pa bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba rin tshan dang du phyug ces pa
134a7(mdo sde): bta // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rtenar gyi khams pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la tshwa
134a8(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba
134b1(mdo sde): yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa me tog sna tshogs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes
134b2(mdo sde): brtson 'grus shes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba zhes bya ba yod/ nga na de bzhin gshegs pa bde ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho dang
134b3(mdo sde): gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges pang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba bde ba ces bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shi 'phos med ces
134b4(mdo sde): byang yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i mngon 'phags dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab
134b5(mdo sde): me tog bzang zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yo ba zhes bya ba yod/ den de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu dpung mgo mtho bas bya
134b6(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab rtag tu spro ba zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rter bya
134b7(mdo sde): khams rtag tu kun tu 'khrugs zhes bya ba yod/ de ra de bzhin gshegs pa rtsi'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sem
134b8(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal chab snying rje chen po'i go cha zhes bya ba bta // ngari yang mngang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams brtan pa zhes bya ba yod/ de ra bzhir gshegs pa dmigs pa mtha' yas pas
135a1(mdo sde): gnas pazhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang stor te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang dubasems dpa' rgyal rab shin tu rang ga a shes bya ba
135a2(mdo sde): bta // de'i yang bdab chags// 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas skabs kyi mtshan nyid cesu bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog batha' yas shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'ato zheng
135a3(mdo sde): gnyis la chos kyang storan te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chubs pas dpa' rgyal tshab tshogs chen zhes bya ba btangango // nga'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i 'od ces bya
135a4(mdo sde): ba yod/ der de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges bang dubs pas dpa' rgyab
135a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshad rang pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang bdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser 'od ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhi ni gshegs pa spyar mthar yA
135a6(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des bang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba mig po che zhes bya ba btangango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten
135a7(mdo sde): gyi khams ma smad pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa kur gyi khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges bang
135a8(mdo sde): chung sems dpa' rgyal chang dga' bo zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang ra dang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gdugs kyis khebs pa zhes bya ba yod/ der de bzhin gshegs pa tshigs
135b1(mdo sde): mchog mtha' yas khyu mchog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho'ang gnas la chos kyang stor te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab spyan ras gzigs nges pa'i go ma
135b2(mdo sde): zhes bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgyu skar gyi phreng ba can zhes bya ba yod/ 'jig rten gyi khams sgra skar gyi phreng ba can de da/ de bzhin gshegs
135b3(mdo sde): pa sgyu skar gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba bta ngo // de'i yang mdang
135b4(mdo sde): chags ra/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen dra bas khebs zhes bya ba yod/ de rang bzhin gshegs pa rgyu skar rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gnas la chos kyang stong/ 
135b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das des byang dung sems dpa' rgyal tshab pad+ma 'i dpal zhes bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'dzi garten gyi khams me tog ces bya ba yod/ de rang pa'i rab rtse
135b6(mdo sde): pa spos mchog dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tsha ba lag na pad+ma zhes bya ba btango // de'i ya ba ra dang
135b7(mdo sde): chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gser can zhes bya ba yod/ de ra de bzhin gshegs pa na mkha'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stor te/ bcom ldan
135b8(mdo sde): 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mig rnam par dag ces ba ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag ces bya ba long / den dpa'ar gshegs
136a1(mdo sde): mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal 'asu bya ba bdugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab ga
136a2(mdo sde): bya ba bang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khabs mya ngan med ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gsung mdzad ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gnyis la chos kyang
136a3(mdo sde): stor te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab 'od ces bya ba btang ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu skar zhes bya ba lod/ de na de bzhin gshegs
136a4(mdo sde): pa lhung por ngor du 'phags shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin tu rang gnas shes bya
136a5(mdo sde): btang / de'i yang mngang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal tshab sna tshogs zhes bya ba yod/ de nang bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyar 'gu ngang 'gyu
136a6(mdo sde): 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'ang sangs byang chub sems dpa' rgyal chab sna tshogs sde zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi b.ras spos
136a7(mdo sde): dad ldang zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab rgya/ 
136a8(mdo sde): mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos can zhes bya ba yod/ de nang bzhin gshegs paskar yang 'dzin ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho
136b1(mdo sde): gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab yang gnyis rnam par 'joms shes bya bangatango // de'i yang mngang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tsar
136b2(mdo sde): ngan spos shes bya ba yod/ de rang bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid gnyis pa'i rtog ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems
136b3(mdo sde): dpa' rgyal tshab grags pa'i sde zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'dzag rten gyi khams dga' ba bzang po zhes bya ba yod/ de ra de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba dri ma yad pa'i gzi
136b4(mdo sde): brjid rtsu po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing ga zhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang dgra rab tu 'jom pa zhes bya
136b5(mdo sde): nga btang / de'i yang radab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi kha mas dga' 'byung zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa ye shes dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis
136b6(mdo sde): la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab don gyi blo gros shes bya ba btang // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags
136b7(mdo sde): bya nga yod/ de rang bzhin gshegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i stobs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sem
136b8(mdo sde): dpang rgyal chab dpa' bo zhes bya ba bta // nga'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes bya ba yod/ de na nga bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal po'i 'od ces
137a1(mdo sde): bya ba bdugs te/ 'tsho'ang gas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshang dor gyi blo gros 'asu bya babang ngo / 
137a2(mdo sde): yang dadang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rnam par bsgobs shes bya ba yod/ de rang bzhin gshegs pa ri chen mi zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gangs pa chos
137a3(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpas byin zhes bya ba ba ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rter gyi khams ling gnyis pa shes bya ba
137a4(mdo sde): yod/ ngar de ba'i gshegs pa ying gnyis thams cang yang dag par 'joms 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang stor te/ bcom ldan 'dra
137a5(mdo sde): ngas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab mi 'jigs pa zhes bya ba bang // de'i yang yangang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan can zhes bya ba yod/ de rang bzhin gshegs par
137a6(mdo sde): sras zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'di gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgron pa 'dzin ces bya ba bangata ngo // de'i yang mdab chags na
137a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bzang ldan zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rtog rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges ba
137a8(mdo sde): chung sems dpar rgyal tshang ba shes gnyen zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams spos mchog ces bya ba yod/ de rang bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i nga
137b1(mdo sde): 'byung zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab ye shes rab mchog ces bya ba btang // nga'i yang mngab gra
137b2(mdo sde): na/ 'jig rten gyi khams tog bzang po zhes bya ba yod/ da na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer rab btang zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcob ldan 'das
137b3(mdo sde): des byang dub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thams cad bshes gnyen zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sprin tshor zhesdu ba pa yod/ der de ba'iragashegs
137b4(mdo sde): pA byams pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab skar rgyal zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang rang ba chags
137b5(mdo sde): na 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba can zhes bya ba yod// de nang bzhir gshegs pa pad+ma snang ba'i 'od zer zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang stor
137b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab chos 'phags shes pa ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snyan pa zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs
137b7(mdo sde): pa spyod pa khyad par can zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bla ngon du 'phags zhes bya ba bang // der yang
137b8(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i gnas shes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas rnam par gnod ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos
138a1(mdo sde): kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang dub sems dpa' rgyal chab bshes gnyer grags ldan zhes bya ba bang ngo // nga'i yang yang ba chags ra/ 'jig
138a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams pad+ma zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i lhung po mngon du 'phags shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das
138a3(mdo sde): des byang chub sems dpa' rgya tsha ba dkor mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba btangango // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs
138a4(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dbang po zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang
138a5(mdo sde): mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan gyis bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gnyis la chos
138a6(mdo sde): ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab dpa' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba btango // de'i yang mngab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par bsgrags shes bya ba
138a7(mdo sde): yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa dbyas kyi nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab shin
138a8(mdo sde): tu rab gnas shes bya ba bta // de'i yang mdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu rab brjod ces bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya
138b1(mdo sde): nga bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang stor te/ bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab sgrogs byed ces bya ba bta // de'i yang bdab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi
138b2(mdo sde): khangs zas kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod/ de dade bzhin gshegs pa tha dad pa me pa'i go cha zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcob ldan 'das nges
138b3(mdo sde): byang dub sems dpa' rgyal tshab thogs pa med pa'i go cha zhes bya ba btang // de'i yang dadab chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khapas tsan dar bsung zhes bya ba yod/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer
138b4(mdo sde): mtha' yas zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'jo 'di gshes la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des byang chub sems pa ba'i rgyal tshab dri ma med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba ba ngo // de
138b5(mdo sde): yang bdang chags na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dran pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod/ de rang bzhidi gshegs pas+t+ra nabazangs shes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'pho 'di gnas
138b6(mdo sde): chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das des bang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab lag na rin chen zhes bya ba bta ngo // bang rku ba sems dpa' de la sogs pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa grangs
138b7(mdo sde): med dpag tu meng ba dag rgyal po'i khab 'od pa'i tshal d+ya ka lar da ka gnas pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'angs la mgo ngas
138b8(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'ba' shig la phyag 'tshal 'di phyogs gcig tu 'khod// de'i tshe lho phyog su 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dpag tu bad pa dag 'das pa na/ 
139a1(mdo sde): bzhidan gshegs pa rin po che'i mdzod gcig pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnyis la chos kyang ston te/ bcom ldan 'das ngas nga'i 'og tu 'di bla na med pa
139a2(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyu ro zhes byang chub sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi phreng ba zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chug tu
139a3(mdo sde): lung bstan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyu skar gyi phreng bas snang ba chen po de mthong ste/ gsung gsal ba'i sgra de yang thos das/ bcom ldan 'das de la rus pa/ 
139a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gsung gsal ba'i sgra grag pa de su'i lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rgyu skar gyi phreng ba 'di nas byung pogasu 'jig rten gyi khams grangs rang dpag tu
139a5(mdo sde): med pa dag 'das pa// 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod/ de rang bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhe sa bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'di lta ste/ byang
139a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos kyang ston to// 'khor dar yang chos mnyar pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngas ma gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha gro
139a7(mdo sde): pa dag 'dus te/ rgyu skar gyi phreng ba 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na ni/ sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'adi dag ji lta bu'i go cha dag gis go cha gos pa'i go cha de lta bu dag gis stongs / 
139a8(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyu skar gyi phreng bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
139b1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyer bkur dgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngas pa gyis pi khyab pa'i go yang gos pa de dag blta
139b2(mdo sde): ba'i slad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams ri mjed der bdag mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i ngas la dbab par shes na song shig/ nga'i tshig gis
139b3(mdo sde): gnod pa chung ngang/ nyam nga ba nyung ngang/ bskyod pa yang nga pa/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sa pa zhes snyun gsol la/ rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang shes bzhin du
139b4(mdo sde): spyod par gnas par bos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi 'ang den byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni bsnyen parang ka' ba'i phyiro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi
139b5(mdo sde): pr-ing bas/ bcom ldan 'das nga'i zhangs la phyag la te/ bskor ba yang bas nas song ste/ de 'di lta steng pe rar/ skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa zhig gis la ge pa bskus
139b6(mdo sde): pa rkyong bar byed pa 'am/ lag pa brkyang bskur par byed pa'i skad cig des/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas pa sdang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'dug sde/ nga rgyal po'i
139b7(mdo sde): khang 'ong ba'i tshal bya ka la rad ka gnas pa gal ba der song ste phyir ras/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
139b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngar / nyam ngang nyung ba dang / bskyod pa yang dang / stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i mdzod gcig pa skur
140a1(mdo sde): gsol lag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang du sems dpa' rgyu skar gyi phreng ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan
